-in output add short english leading thoughtful  questions at the end  relevent to 30 Restaurants & Cafés That Are Perfect For A Romantic Date img-user-muskan-bansal-778750405967 By Muskan 178747  Interested | 257K   Views Sometimes, all you need for a great night is you, your significant other, a great menu, a couple of delicious drinks and music you can vibe to. And these 30 restaurants in Delhi will give you just that. Let's be honest, we don't need no Valentine's day to go on a date.  Cafe De Flora Cafe De Flora, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map A newbie in town, this cafe is located in Chanakyapuri and is one of those places that goes big on festivities. So, on Valentine’s Day, you can expect the place to have all things hearty. It has a very Parisian vibe, and we are personally quite excited to try it out and have an Emily In Paris moment. We've heard their hot chocolate is a must-try. We think your date would be pleasantly surprised by the vibe of this place.  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.7/5  Timings: 11 AM - 9:30 PM  Must-Try: Hot Chocolate, Cheesecake, Pasta, Drinks  Olive Olive Bar & Kitchen, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map A recent dinner here with a girlfriend (Thank you, Leslie Knope, for bringing Galentines into our lives) helped us realise that it's the perfect spot for a chill and romantic time with your S.O. (or your Galentine?). Olive has revamped their menu and the outside is perfect for all kinds of dates.  Price For Two: INR 4,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Cheese Souffle, Fettucine, Scallops, Lobster, Gnocchi  Sevilla Sevilla - The Claridges, Aurangzeb Road, New Delhi See On Map Private canopies, enough candles and dim lighting can make any romance glow, and they've got one of the best menus in the capital. Again, on request, they will customise the menu, sprinkle rose petals, pop a bottle of champagne, and offer impeccable service. But be warned, you’re going to need to be plush with cash—Sevilla is pricey, with a capital P.  Price For Two: INR 4,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 7 PM -10:45 PM  Must-Try: Patata Bravas, Duck, Risotto, Sangria, Ravioli, Wine  Townhall Town Hall, Khan Market, New Delhi See On Map Best sushi, and definitely in the running for best black cod. Ask for a table on the terrace for the candles to really take effect, and on request, they’ll personalise the placard at your table. So, perhaps a 'Welcome <insert other half’s name>', waiting for you when you arrive? Two words: classy and romantic.  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM–11 PM  Must-Try: Spicy Edamame, Rock Shrimp Tempura, Non-Veg Mezze Platter, Crispy Lamb, Sushi Rolls  Le Cirque, The Leela Palace Le Cirque - The Leela Palace, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Le Cirque is the perfect place to go to if you're looking for a) a romantic setting and b) French and Italian food! We definitely recommend you give their Creme Brule, Morel Mushroom Risotto and maybe even Pumpkin soups a go. Also, do not forego their wines and cocktails because, well, romance, Valentine's and wine kind of go hand-in-hand.   Price For Two: INR 5,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 7 PM–11:30 PM  Must-Try: Morel Mushroom Risotto, Scallops, Wine, Cocktails, Desserts  Guppy Guppy, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi See On Map Did somebody say affordable and remarkable seafood? If you’re looking to step up your date night with some sushi, Guppy is your new pit stop. Their fresh food, enticing cocktails, and toothsome desserts ought to propel your romantic date night to another level. Their dimly lit yet colourful ambience is a treat to the eyes! You’d better put this on your go-to list for the 2024 Valentine's Day celebrations.  Price For Two: INR 2,700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 12 PM - 4:30 PM, 6 PM - 11:30 PM   Must-Try: Exotic Mushroom Gyoza, Grilled Jumbo Prawn, Artichoke Salad, Chicken Karaage, Salmon Salad, Pork Belly  Fio Cookhouse Fio Cookhouse & Bar, Nehru Place, New Delhi See On Map Be warned, on the weekends, Fio turns into a party pad, with very loud music after 10.30 PM, so plan for during the week, and early-ish. Tables outside are surrounded by a lot of greenery, wooden decks, and definitely let you forget you’re under a metro station. Also - cocktails. You’ll be glad the lighting is dim (read: romantic).   Price For Two: INR 3,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Chocolate Flan, Mushroom Croquette, Spinach Ravioli, Wild Mushroom Risotto, Tiramisu Jar, Banoffee Pie  Music & Mountains Music & Mountains Cafe, Greater Kailash - 1, New Delhi See On Map With its charming ambience and flavourful food, Music & Mountains makes it to this list. Expect candle-lit tables and some great music here, making this an ideal place for a romantic date. Go for a coffee at brunch or for Sangria at dinner, this place will never cease to leave you in awe.  Price For Two: INR 2,100 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Chicken Pot Pie, Mushroom Ravioli, Salami Pizza, Apple Crumble, Spinach Ravioli, Chicken Stroganoff  QLA Qla, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map If you're into Spanish, Italian, and Mediterranean cuisines and pretty outdoor seating covered in canopies, or just minimal wooden tables set up in fresh air, then QLA is where you should go (also QLA is legit known for its superb and romantic outdoor seating). You should also give their risotto and pasta a go for sure.  Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.1/5  Timings: 12 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Chicken Slider, Wine, Tiramisu, Cocktail, Sangria, Prawn  Sidecar Sidecar, Greater Kailash - 2, New Delhi See On Map If you really enjoy cocktails with dinner, we suggest you check out Sidecar. It's a great place to head to if you also enjoy cosy settings with nice, wooden tables and enjoy old style bars as an aesthetic. We say, you go here for good Asian and continental food, and do give their Thai Basil Chicken a go. For drinks, you should certainly try their Yang's Old Fashioned (if you're into bourbon).   Price For Two: INR 1,600 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 1 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Corn Curd, Avocado Toast, Lamb Curry, Cocktail, Drink, Dessert  Saffron Boutique The Saffron Boutique, Sector 104, Noida See On Map This Noida-based restaurant is perfect for great North Indian, Mughlai, and Chinese food. The interiors are super cute; the entire space has a vintage and cosy vibe (the wooden floors plus the pretty white chairs and tables are a testament to that). We recommend you try their dal makhani or butter chicken for sure.   Price For Two: INR 1,400 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 12 PM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Kesar Kheer, Roasted Pineapple, Chicken Lababdaar, Vegetable Spring Roll, Afghan Chicken, Laal Maas  Indian Accent Indian Accent - The Lodhi, Lodhi Road, New Delhi See On Map Indian Accent is the place to head to if you enjoy fine dining experiences and to probably celebrate something super special (your five-year anniversary, maybe?). If you're the kind who likes big glass windows and open, contemporary spaces, then this is the spot for you. But more importantly, you must try their dal makhani and Chur Chur Blue Cheese Naan. A meal here will definitely do some damage to your bank balance but hey, the meal will be one that you and your bae will always remember!   Price For Two: INR 5,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.9/5  Timings: 12 PM - 2 PM and 7 PM - 10:30 PM  Must-Try:  Sweet Corn Shorba, Mushroom Kulcha, Wine Cellar, Doda Barfi, Butter Chicken Kulcha, Chur Chur Parantha  Bo Tai Bo Tai, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map Bo Tai in the Qutub complex is a stunning space in Mehrauli. It has a unique spin on Thai food and does some pretty potent cocktails. The mood-lighting set-up that the place has is perfect for a romantic dinner date. Their menu is nothing short of delicious. We recommend you try their cocktails since it is known for it, especially their Full Moon Festival. However, all the other cocktails are equally good.   Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Crab Cake, Massaman Curry, Scallops, Avocado Salad, Crispy Prawns, Lamb Chops  The Spice Route, Imperial Hotel The Spice Route - The Imperial, Janpath, New Delhi See On Map With murals and antiques that reflect the roots of the historical spice route, serves food from the Malabar Coast in Kerala, Malaysia, Vietnam, Sri Lanka, Thailand, and Indonesia to reflect the journey of spices. The Spice Route is a rather unique experience for you to take your partner for this Valentine’s Day. With a beautiful ambience, it’s safe to say that it will be a win for your date.  Price For Two: INR 7,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 2:45 AM, 7 PM - 11:45 PM  Must-Try: Appam, Pad Thai, Stew, Wine, Spring Rolls, Desserts  Amour Bistro Amour Bistro, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Amour Bistro is perfect for Continental and Italian food. It's also got a super chic, industrial theme going inside; basically, imagine high loft ceilings, cobbled floors, and high, New York-style windows. Is that not tempting enough for y'all to plan a romantic date here? But when it comes to food, we recommend that you go ahead and try their pizza and pasta, specifically their Pesto and Mushroom Spaghetti, along with their Alligator (a cucumber, blueberry and orange-based cocktail).  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 8 AM - 12 PM  Must-Try: Shephards Pie, Gnocchi, Quiche, Pork Ribs, Banoffee Pie, Blueberry Cheesecake  Gumbad Café Gumbad Cafe, Jama Masjid, New Delhi See On Map If you two are core romantics and would love to get the Gumbad (tomb) of Jama Masjid in the backdrop as you enjoy a beautiful evening, then you can head to Gumbad Café, which is famously known as a mini-Turkey or mini-Dubai for its view of the masjid which is up close and personal and not just that they’ve got some interesting food too. This turns out to be the ‘it’ spot of Delhi, lately. The view is incredible and has everything you need for your date night. However, the place is usually extremely crowded, so plan your date night accordingly.  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Soups, Shawarma Rolls, Signature Risotto, Kung Pao Chicken  Omo OMO Cafe, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map Omo is one of our favourite places to go for a soul-satisfying meal. They're a farm-to-fork concept with an earthy, minimalistic, and warm ambience located in Galleria, Gurgaon. We think it will be perfect for you if you two love clean-minimalistic ambience. Don't hesitate to ask the staff about recommendations, we've heard they're very well-versed with the menu, and no dish will disappoint.   Price For Two: INR 2,100 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Timings: 9:30 AM - 10 PM  Must Try: Portobello Katsu sandwich, Omo's King Mushrooms, Wild Corn Tacos, and Parmesan Ravioli  Colocal Colocal, Sector 104, Noida See On Map Things get so much sweeter when you take your date to a chocolate factory that is also a café. Colocal is a great place to enjoy a hearty meal and end the date with loads and loads of chocolates for a major sugar rush. We would recommend you to head to their recently-opened Noida outlet, for it takes you on a ride to Goa with its beautiful architecture and ambience.  Price For Two: INR 1,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 11 AM - 11 AM  Must-Try: Tortellini Pasta, Fish and Chips, Garden Salad, Iced Mocha, Gnocchi, Hot Chocolate  Cirrus 9. - Oberoi Cirrus 9 - The Oberoi, Golf Links, New Delhi See On Map Cirrus 9 is a bar, but since it’s got a beautiful view overlooking the city, we had to recommend this to you. Of course, if you are a party-animal duo, this is just the right recommendation for you. With minimalistic interiors and an amazing ambience, they have a bar inside and at the Alfresco as well.  Price For Two: INR 4,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 5 AM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Yakitori, Goat Cheese Crostini, Pan Fried Gyoza  Kampai Kampai, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map If you are a duo who bonds over sushi, we think Kampai in Aerocity should be your place for this Valentine’s Day.  The moment you step into the restaurant, you will certainly get a feel of Japan, where cherry blossoms are embellished on the ceiling, and traditional Japanese portraits adorn the walls. You can book a private seating space for privacy. The food is quite expensive but worth it and will take you on a sweet trip to Japan.   Price For Two: INR 4,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Timings: 12 PM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Tempura Udon, Katsu Curry, Ebi Tempura, Tempura Prawns, Authentic Japanese Food, Matcha  Ladera Ladera - Clarens Hotel, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map Ladera is another fine-dining restaurant that one should definitely consider. You can head here for Continental, Mediterranean, and European food. They've got a contemporary, modern, and luxurious vibe. Ladera has a romantic, canopy-covered outdoor seating area too! Do try their risotto and baklava; it'll definitely make your date night even better.  Price For Two: INR 3,800 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Timings: 6 PM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Risotto, Lasagna, Cocktails, Dessert, Pizzas, Salad  American Brew American Brew, Defence Colony, New Delhi See On Map If you are the kind of couple who love chilling at cafés and do not prefer an extremely formal setting then, we’ve got you one of the best options. American Brew has recently opened up in Defence Colony, and we are absolutely in love with their coffee and dining. From scrumptious food to amazing drinks, we would recommend you head here for a brunch date.  Price For Two: INR 1,600 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 8 AM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Berries Waffles, Tomato Bruscetta, Avoacdo Toast, Four Cheese Pizza    Maruchi Maruchi, Lado Sarai, New Delhi See On Map If you're looking for a space to get good food, ambience, and perhaps an ideal date, then Maruchi is the place for you. With a large indoor and outdoor space, they not only offer great food but also serve sheesha, which makes it the perfect spot for your Valentine’s day date. The outdoor sitting faces the golf course view, and we can vouch for how gorgeous it looks while maintaining an equally pretty indoor. They are centrally located and offer a variety of Asian food, Teppanyaki, and cocktails.   Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Truffle Enoki Tempura, Prawn Tempura, Exotic Mushroom Dumpling  Threesixtyone Degrees Threesixtyone Degrees - The Oberoi, Udyog Vihar, Gurgaon See On Map The ambience of Threesixtyone Degrees at The Oberoi Hotel in Gurgaon is utterly gorgeous and is a great spot for a memorable date. This all-day fine dining restaurant is very in-demand so make sure you call in and make a reservation. They have it all in store —Japanese, Chinese, Italian, and North Indian cuisines, as well as lip-smacking desserts.  Price For Two: INR 5,500 (approx.) So, on Valentine’s Day, you can expect the place to have all things hearty. It has a very Parisian vibe, and we are personally quite excited to try it out and have an Emily In Paris moment. We've heard their hot chocolate is a must-try. We think your date would be pleasantly surprised by the vibe of this place.  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.7/5  Timings: 11 AM - 9:30 PM  Must-Try: Hot Chocolate, Cheesecake, Pasta, Drinks  Olive Olive Bar & Kitchen, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map A recent dinner here with a girlfriend (Thank you, Leslie Knope, for bringing Galentines into our lives) helped us realise that it's the perfect spot for a chill and romantic time with your S.O. (or your Galentine?). Olive has revamped their menu and the outside is perfect for all kinds of dates.  Price For Two: INR 4,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Cheese Souffle, Fettucine, Scallops, Lobster, Gnocchi  Sevilla Sevilla - The Claridges, Aurangzeb Road, New Delhi See On Map Private canopies, enough candles and dim lighting can make any romance glow, and they've got one of the best menus in the capital. Again, on request, they will customise the menu, sprinkle rose petals, pop a bottle of champagne, and offer impeccable service. But be warned, you’re going to need to be plush with cash—Sevilla is pricey, with a capital P.  Price For Two: INR 4,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 7 PM -10:45 PM  Must-Try: Patata Bravas, Duck, Risotto, Sangria, Ravioli, Wine  Townhall Town Hall, Khan Market, New Delhi See On Map Best sushi, and definitely in the running for best black cod. Ask for a table on the terrace for the candles to really take effect, and on request, they’ll personalise the placard at your table. So, perhaps a 'Welcome <insert other half’s name>', waiting for you when you arrive? Two words: classy and romantic.  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM–11 PM  Must-Try: Spicy Edamame, Rock Shrimp Tempura, Non-Veg Mezze Platter, Crispy Lamb, Sushi Rolls  Le Cirque, The Leela Palace Le Cirque - The Leela Palace, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Le Cirque is the perfect place to go to if you're looking for a) a romantic setting and b) French and Italian food! We definitely recommend you give their Creme Brule, Morel Mushroom Risotto and maybe even Pumpkin soups a go. Also, do not forego their wines and cocktails because, well, romance, Valentine's and wine kind of go hand-in-hand.   Price For Two: INR 5,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 7 PM–11:30 PM  Must-Try: Morel Mushroom Risotto, Scallops, Wine, Cocktails, Desserts  Guppy Guppy, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi See On Map Did somebody say affordable and remarkable seafood? If you’re looking to step up your date night with some sushi, Guppy is your new pit stop. Their fresh food, enticing cocktails, and toothsome desserts ought to propel your romantic date night to another level. Their dimly lit yet colourful ambience is a treat to the eyes! You’d better put this on your go-to list for the 2024 Valentine's Day celebrations.  Price For Two: INR 2,700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 12 PM - 4:30 PM, 6 PM - 11:30 PM   Must-Try: Exotic Mushroom Gyoza, Grilled Jumbo Prawn, Artichoke Salad, Chicken Karaage, Salmon Salad, Pork Belly  Fio Cookhouse Fio Cookhouse & Bar, Nehru Place, New Delhi See On Map Be warned, on the weekends, Fio turns into a party pad, with very loud music after 10.30 PM, so plan for during the week, and early-ish. Tables outside are surrounded by a lot of greenery, wooden decks, and definitely let you forget you’re under a metro station. Also - cocktails. You’ll be glad the lighting is dim (read: romantic).   Price For Two: INR 3,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Chocolate Flan, Mushroom Croquette, Spinach Ravioli, Wild Mushroom Risotto, Tiramisu Jar, Banoffee Pie  Music & Mountains Music & Mountains Cafe, Greater Kailash - 1, New Delhi See On Map With its charming ambience and flavourful food, Music & Mountains makes it to this list. Expect candle-lit tables and some great music here, making this an ideal place for a romantic date. Go for a coffee at brunch or for Sangria at dinner, this place will never cease to leave you in awe.  Price For Two: INR 2,100 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Chicken Pot Pie, Mushroom Ravioli, Salami Pizza, Apple Crumble, Spinach Ravioli, Chicken Stroganoff  QLA Qla, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map If you're into Spanish, Italian, and Mediterranean cuisines and pretty outdoor seating covered in canopies, or just minimal wooden tables set up in fresh air, then QLA is where you should go (also QLA is legit known for its superb and romantic outdoor seating). You should also give their risotto and pasta a go for sure.  Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.1/5  Timings: 12 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Chicken Slider, Wine, Tiramisu, Cocktail, Sangria, Prawn  Sidecar Sidecar, Greater Kailash - 2, New Delhi See On Map If you really enjoy cocktails with dinner, we suggest you check out Sidecar. It's a great place to head to if you also enjoy cosy settings with nice, wooden tables and enjoy old style bars as an aesthetic. We say, you go here for good Asian and continental food, and do give their Thai Basil Chicken a go. For drinks, you should certainly try their Yang's Old Fashioned (if you're into bourbon).   Price For Two: INR 1,600 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 1 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Corn Curd, Avocado Toast, Lamb Curry, Cocktail, Drink, Dessert  Saffron Boutique The Saffron Boutique, Sector 104, Noida See On Map This Noida-based restaurant is perfect for great North Indian, Mughlai, and Chinese food. The interiors are super cute; the entire space has a vintage and cosy vibe (the wooden floors plus the pretty white chairs and tables are a testament to that). We recommend you try their dal makhani or butter chicken for sure.   Price For Two: INR 1,400 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 12 PM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Kesar Kheer, Roasted Pineapple, Chicken Lababdaar, Vegetable Spring Roll, Afghan Chicken, Laal Maas  Indian Accent Indian Accent - The Lodhi, Lodhi Road, New Delhi See On Map Indian Accent is the place to head to if you enjoy fine dining experiences and to probably celebrate something super special (your five-year anniversary, maybe?). If you're the kind who likes big glass windows and open, contemporary spaces, then this is the spot for you. But more importantly, you must try their dal makhani and Chur Chur Blue Cheese Naan. A meal here will definitely do some damage to your bank balance but hey, the meal will be one that you and your bae will always remember!   Price For Two: INR 5,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.9/5  Timings: 12 PM - 2 PM and 7 PM - 10:30 PM  Must-Try:  Sweet Corn Shorba, Mushroom Kulcha, Wine Cellar, Doda Barfi, Butter Chicken Kulcha, Chur Chur Parantha  Bo Tai Bo Tai, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map Bo Tai in the Qutub complex is a stunning space in Mehrauli. It has a unique spin on Thai food and does some pretty potent cocktails. The mood-lighting set-up that the place has is perfect for a romantic dinner date. Their menu is nothing short of delicious. We recommend you try their cocktails since it is known for it, especially their Full Moon Festival. However, all the other cocktails are equally good.   Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Crab Cake, Massaman Curry, Scallops, Avocado Salad, Crispy Prawns, Lamb Chops  The Spice Route, Imperial Hotel The Spice Route - The Imperial, Janpath, New Delhi See On Map With murals and antiques that reflect the roots of the historical spice route, serves food from the Malabar Coast in Kerala, Malaysia, Vietnam, Sri Lanka, Thailand, and Indonesia to reflect the journey of spices. The Spice Route is a rather unique experience for you to take your partner for this Valentine’s Day. With a beautiful ambience, it’s safe to say that it will be a win for your date.  Price For Two: INR 7,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 2:45 AM, 7 PM - 11:45 PM  Must-Try: Appam, Pad Thai, Stew, Wine, Spring Rolls, Desserts  Amour Bistro Amour Bistro, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Amour Bistro is perfect for Continental and Italian food. It's also got a super chic, industrial theme going inside; basically, imagine high loft ceilings, cobbled floors, and high, New York-style windows. Is that not tempting enough for y'all to plan a romantic date here? But when it comes to food, we recommend that you go ahead and try their pizza and pasta, specifically their Pesto and Mushroom Spaghetti, along with their Alligator (a cucumber, blueberry and orange-based cocktail).  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 8 AM - 12 PM  Must-Try: Shephards Pie, Gnocchi, Quiche, Pork Ribs, Banoffee Pie, Blueberry Cheesecake  Gumbad Café Gumbad Cafe, Jama Masjid, New Delhi See On Map If you two are core romantics and would love to get the Gumbad (tomb) of Jama Masjid in the backdrop as you enjoy a beautiful evening, then you can head to Gumbad Café, which is famously known as a mini-Turkey or mini-Dubai for its view of the masjid which is up close and personal and not just that they’ve got some interesting food too. This turns out to be the ‘it’ spot of Delhi, lately. The view is incredible and has everything you need for your date night. However, the place is usually extremely crowded, so plan your date night accordingly.  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Soups, Shawarma Rolls, Signature Risotto, Kung Pao Chicken  Omo OMO Cafe, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map Omo is one of our favourite places to go for a soul-satisfying meal. They're a farm-to-fork concept with an earthy, minimalistic, and warm ambience located in Galleria, Gurgaon. We think it will be perfect for you if you two love clean-minimalistic ambience. Don't hesitate to ask the staff about recommendations, we've heard they're very well-versed with the menu, and no dish will disappoint.   Price For Two: INR 2,100 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Timings: 9:30 AM - 10 PM  Must Try: Portobello Katsu sandwich, Omo's King Mushrooms, Wild Corn Tacos, and Parmesan Ravioli  Colocal Colocal, Sector 104, Noida See On Map Things get so much sweeter when you take your date to a chocolate factory that is also a café. Colocal is a great place to enjoy a hearty meal and end the date with loads and loads of chocolates for a major sugar rush. We would recommend you to head to their recently-opened Noida outlet, for it takes you on a ride to Goa with its beautiful architecture and ambience.  Price For Two: INR 1,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 11 AM - 11 AM  Must-Try: Tortellini Pasta, Fish and Chips, Garden Salad, Iced Mocha, Gnocchi, Hot Chocolate  Cirrus 9. - Oberoi Cirrus 9 - The Oberoi, Golf Links, New Delhi See On Map Cirrus 9 is a bar, but since it’s got a beautiful view overlooking the city, we had to recommend this to you. Of course, if you are a party-animal duo, this is just the right recommendation for you. With minimalistic interiors and an amazing ambience, they have a bar inside and at the Alfresco as well.  Price For Two: INR 4,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 5 AM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Yakitori, Goat Cheese Crostini, Pan Fried Gyoza  Kampai Kampai, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map If you are a duo who bonds over sushi, we think Kampai in Aerocity should be your place for this Valentine’s Day.  The moment you step into the restaurant, you will certainly get a feel of Japan, where cherry blossoms are embellished on the ceiling, and traditional Japanese portraits adorn the walls. You can book a private seating space for privacy. The food is quite expensive but worth it and will take you on a sweet trip to Japan.   Price For Two: INR 4,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Timings: 12 PM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Tempura Udon, Katsu Curry, Ebi Tempura, Tempura Prawns, Authentic Japanese Food, Matcha  Ladera Ladera - Clarens Hotel, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map Ladera is another fine-dining restaurant that one should definitely consider. You can head here for Continental, Mediterranean, and European food. They've got a contemporary, modern, and luxurious vibe. Ladera has a romantic, canopy-covered outdoor seating area too! Do try their risotto and baklava; it'll definitely make your date night even better.  Price For Two: INR 3,800 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Timings: 6 PM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Risotto, Lasagna, Cocktails, Dessert, Pizzas, Salad  American Brew American Brew, Defence Colony, New Delhi See On Map If you are the kind of couple who love chilling at cafés and do not prefer an extremely formal setting then, we’ve got you one of the best options. American Brew has recently opened up in Defence Colony, and we are absolutely in love with their coffee and dining. From scrumptious food to amazing drinks, we would recommend you head here for a brunch date.  Price For Two: INR 1,600 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 8 AM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Berries Waffles, Tomato Bruscetta, Avoacdo Toast, Four Cheese Pizza    Maruchi Maruchi, Lado Sarai, New Delhi See On Map If you're looking for a space to get good food, ambience, and perhaps an ideal date, then Maruchi is the place for you. With a large indoor and outdoor space, they not only offer great food but also serve sheesha, which makes it the perfect spot for your Valentine’s day date. The outdoor sitting faces the golf course view, and we can vouch for how gorgeous it looks while maintaining an equally pretty indoor. They are centrally located and offer a variety of Asian food, Teppanyaki, and cocktails.   Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Truffle Enoki Tempura, Prawn Tempura, Exotic Mushroom Dumpling  Threesixtyone Degrees Threesixtyone Degrees - The Oberoi, Udyog Vihar, Gurgaon See On Map The ambience of Threesixtyone Degrees at The Oberoi Hotel in Gurgaon is utterly gorgeous and is a great spot for a memorable date. This all-day fine dining restaurant is very in-demand so make sure you call in and make a reservation. They have it all in store —Japanese, Chinese, Italian, and North Indian cuisines, as well as lip-smacking desserts.  Price For Two: INR 5,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Timings: 9 AM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Buffet, Chocolate Cake, Thai Curry, Salads, Dimsums, Virgin Mojito  Diggin Diggin, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Although Diggin is technically a cafe and not a fine dining restaurant, we believe that it's an extremely stunning option for a date night; especially at night because of all the pretty fairy lights they always have up. You can go here for their Italian dishes and we suggest that you try their Mutton Lasagna with Mushroom Calzone (vegetarians can go for vegetarian Lasagna, filled with mozzarella cheese and tomato concasse sauce), Margherita Pizza, and the Chocolate Brownie Shake.  Price For Two: INR 1,300 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 11 AM - 9:30 PM  Must-Try: Penne Picante, Tuna Melt Sandwich, Veg Cannelloni, Ferrero Rocher Milkshake, Chicken Crostini, Garden Burger  Comorin Comorin, DLF Phase - 5, Gurgaon See On Map From decor to menu Comorin is luxe in every aspect. The service is impeccable, the food menu is impressive, and they have an amazing bar menu too. There's even a curated shop of gourmet and lifestyle products within the premises and a coffee shop that serves some of the finest, artisanal coffee. The food here is a modern take on familiar classics from across the country without compromising on the flavour.  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.8/5  Timings: 12 AM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Champaran Style Mutton, Gunpowder Idli, Cocktails, Sev Puri, Haleem, Chocolate Dessert  Piano Man The Piano Man, Sector 15, Gurgaon See On Map Piano Man has three outlets: Gurgaon, Malviya Nagar and Safdarjung Enclave. They have awesome gigs lined up every day which makes it an even better place to drop by for date night for a dose of vibrant jazz music and a good drink. The Gurgaon branch has bright lights (245 trumpet chandelier, to be precise), a deep maroon curtain, wooden pews, and interiors that'll take you back to the 20's prohibition era!   Price For Two: INR 2000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 1 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Tomato Basil Spaghetti, Mimosa, Chicken Slider, Egg Sandwich, Spaghetti Pasta, Pepperoni Pizza  Kiyan Kiyan - The Roseate, New Delhi See On Map Kiyan at The Roseate is set in a beautiful green area with tall pillars and water that reflects its outdoor seating. Inside, you find more beauty in the service and presentation of the food. Popular dishes include Wild Mushroom Soup, Galouti Kebabs and Thai Curry.   Price For Two: INR 5,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 7 AM - 10:30 AM, 12:30 PM - 3 PM, 7 PM - 11:30 PM   Must-Try: Pomelo Salad, Thai Rice, Wild Mushroom Soup, Pad Thai, Galouti Kebab, Khichdi  Raise The Bar Raise The Bar Rooftop - Clarens Hotel, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map A rooftop lounge with great cocktails and an awesome ambience is all we really need for date night! Raise The Bar offers Continental, European and Italian with the perfect view.  Price For Two: INR 2,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 6 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Red Wine Sangria, Banoffee Pie, Cocktails, Sushi, Drinks, White Sauce Pasta  Jamun Jamun, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi See On Map With an admirable hue of pink all over the walls and relaxing music playing in the background, a date night at Jamun would surely be among your best-ever date nights. The place is great for the gram and is equally great for relishing in some delectable Mughlai cuisine.  Price For Two: INR 1,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 12 AM - 11:30 PM  Must Try: Aloo Tuk, Dahi Gol Gappa, Jamun Kulfi, Mutton Ghee Roast, Ghee Rice, Tandoori Tikka  Pro-Tip If you're running slightly low on cash and are looking for places that are easier on the pocket, we suggest you check out our guide here. Expect candle-lit tables and some great music here, making this an ideal place for a romantic date. Go for a coffee at brunch or for Sangria at dinner, this place will never cease to leave you in awe.  Price For Two: INR 2,100 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Chicken Pot Pie, Mushroom Ravioli, Salami Pizza, Apple Crumble, Spinach Ravioli, Chicken Stroganoff  QLA Qla, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map If you're into Spanish, Italian, and Mediterranean cuisines and pretty outdoor seating covered in canopies, or just minimal wooden tables set up in fresh air, then QLA is where you should go (also QLA is legit known for its superb and romantic outdoor seating). You should also give their risotto and pasta a go for sure.  Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.1/5  Timings: 12 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Chicken Slider, Wine, Tiramisu, Cocktail, Sangria, Prawn  Sidecar Sidecar, Greater Kailash - 2, New Delhi See On Map If you really enjoy cocktails with dinner, we suggest you check out Sidecar. It's a great place to head to if you also enjoy cosy settings with nice, wooden tables and enjoy old style bars as an aesthetic. We say, you go here for good Asian and continental food, and do give their Thai Basil Chicken a go. For drinks, you should certainly try their Yang's Old Fashioned (if you're into bourbon).   Price For Two: INR 1,600 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 1 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Corn Curd, Avocado Toast, Lamb Curry, Cocktail, Drink, Dessert  Saffron Boutique The Saffron Boutique, Sector 104, Noida See On Map This Noida-based restaurant is perfect for great North Indian, Mughlai, and Chinese food. The interiors are super cute; the entire space has a vintage and cosy vibe (the wooden floors plus the pretty white chairs and tables are a testament to that). We recommend you try their dal makhani or butter chicken for sure.   Price For Two: INR 1,400 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 12 PM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Kesar Kheer, Roasted Pineapple, Chicken Lababdaar, Vegetable Spring Roll, Afghan Chicken, Laal Maas  Indian Accent Indian Accent - The Lodhi, Lodhi Road, New Delhi See On Map Indian Accent is the place to head to if you enjoy fine dining experiences and to probably celebrate something super special (your five-year anniversary, maybe?). If you're the kind who likes big glass windows and open, contemporary spaces, then this is the spot for you. But more importantly, you must try their dal makhani and Chur Chur Blue Cheese Naan. A meal here will definitely do some damage to your bank balance but hey, the meal will be one that you and your bae will always remember!   Price For Two: INR 5,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.9/5  Timings: 12 PM - 2 PM and 7 PM - 10:30 PM  Must-Try:  Sweet Corn Shorba, Mushroom Kulcha, Wine Cellar, Doda Barfi, Butter Chicken Kulcha, Chur Chur Parantha  Bo Tai Bo Tai, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map Bo Tai in the Qutub complex is a stunning space in Mehrauli. It has a unique spin on Thai food and does some pretty potent cocktails. The mood-lighting set-up that the place has is perfect for a romantic dinner date. Their menu is nothing short of delicious. We recommend you try their cocktails since it is known for it, especially their Full Moon Festival. However, all the other cocktails are equally good.   Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Crab Cake, Massaman Curry, Scallops, Avocado Salad, Crispy Prawns, Lamb Chops  The Spice Route, Imperial Hotel The Spice Route - The Imperial, Janpath, New Delhi See On Map With murals and antiques that reflect the roots of the historical spice route, serves food from the Malabar Coast in Kerala, Malaysia, Vietnam, Sri Lanka, Thailand, and Indonesia to reflect the journey of spices. The Spice Route is a rather unique experience for you to take your partner for this Valentine’s Day. With a beautiful ambience, it’s safe to say that it will be a win for your date.  Price For Two: INR 7,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 2:45 AM, 7 PM - 11:45 PM  Must-Try: Appam, Pad Thai, Stew, Wine, Spring Rolls, Desserts  Amour Bistro Amour Bistro, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Amour Bistro is perfect for Continental and Italian food. It's also got a super chic, industrial theme going inside; basically, imagine high loft ceilings, cobbled floors, and high, New York-style windows. Is that not tempting enough for y'all to plan a romantic date here? But when it comes to food, we recommend that you go ahead and try their pizza and pasta, specifically their Pesto and Mushroom Spaghetti, along with their Alligator (a cucumber, blueberry and orange-based cocktail).  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 8 AM - 12 PM  Must-Try: Shephards Pie, Gnocchi, Quiche, Pork Ribs, Banoffee Pie, Blueberry Cheesecake  Gumbad Café Gumbad Cafe, Jama Masjid, New Delhi See On Map If you two are core romantics and would love to get the Gumbad (tomb) of Jama Masjid in the backdrop as you enjoy a beautiful evening, then you can head to Gumbad Café, which is famously known as a mini-Turkey or mini-Dubai for its view of the masjid which is up close and personal and not just that they’ve got some interesting food too. This turns out to be the ‘it’ spot of Delhi, lately. The view is incredible and has everything you need for your date night. However, the place is usually extremely crowded, so plan your date night accordingly.  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Soups, Shawarma Rolls, Signature Risotto, Kung Pao Chicken  Omo OMO Cafe, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map Omo is one of our favourite places to go for a soul-satisfying meal. They're a farm-to-fork concept with an earthy, minimalistic, and warm ambience located in Galleria, Gurgaon. We think it will be perfect for you if you two love clean-minimalistic ambience. Don't hesitate to ask the staff about recommendations, we've heard they're very well-versed with the menu, and no dish will disappoint.   Price For Two: INR 2,100 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Timings: 9:30 AM - 10 PM  Must Try: Portobello Katsu sandwich, Omo's King Mushrooms, Wild Corn Tacos, and Parmesan Ravioli  Colocal Colocal, Sector 104, Noida See On Map Things get so much sweeter when you take your date to a chocolate factory that is also a café. Colocal is a great place to enjoy a hearty meal and end the date with loads and loads of chocolates for a major sugar rush. We would recommend you to head to their recently-opened Noida outlet, for it takes you on a ride to Goa with its beautiful architecture and ambience.  Price For Two: INR 1,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 11 AM - 11 AM  Must-Try: Tortellini Pasta, Fish and Chips, Garden Salad, Iced Mocha, Gnocchi, Hot Chocolate  Cirrus 9. - Oberoi Cirrus 9 - The Oberoi, Golf Links, New Delhi See On Map Cirrus 9 is a bar, but since it’s got a beautiful view overlooking the city, we had to recommend this to you. Of course, if you are a party-animal duo, this is just the right recommendation for you. With minimalistic interiors and an amazing ambience, they have a bar inside and at the Alfresco as well.  Price For Two: INR 4,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 5 AM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Yakitori, Goat Cheese Crostini, Pan Fried Gyoza  Kampai Kampai, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map If you are a duo who bonds over sushi, we think Kampai in Aerocity should be your place for this Valentine’s Day.  The moment you step into the restaurant, you will certainly get a feel of Japan, where cherry blossoms are embellished on the ceiling, and traditional Japanese portraits adorn the walls. You can book a private seating space for privacy. The food is quite expensive but worth it and will take you on a sweet trip to Japan.   Price For Two: INR 4,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Timings: 12 PM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Tempura Udon, Katsu Curry, Ebi Tempura, Tempura Prawns, Authentic Japanese Food, Matcha  Ladera Ladera - Clarens Hotel, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map Ladera is another fine-dining restaurant that one should definitely consider. You can head here for Continental, Mediterranean, and European food. They've got a contemporary, modern, and luxurious vibe. Ladera has a romantic, canopy-covered outdoor seating area too! Do try their risotto and baklava; it'll definitely make your date night even better.  Price For Two: INR 3,800 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Timings: 6 PM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Risotto, Lasagna, Cocktails, Dessert, Pizzas, Salad  American Brew American Brew, Defence Colony, New Delhi See On Map If you are the kind of couple who love chilling at cafés and do not prefer an extremely formal setting then, we’ve got you one of the best options. American Brew has recently opened up in Defence Colony, and we are absolutely in love with their coffee and dining. From scrumptious food to amazing drinks, we would recommend you head here for a brunch date.  Price For Two: INR 1,600 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 8 AM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Berries Waffles, Tomato Bruscetta, Avoacdo Toast, Four Cheese Pizza    Maruchi Maruchi, Lado Sarai, New Delhi See On Map If you're looking for a space to get good food, ambience, and perhaps an ideal date, then Maruchi is the place for you. With a large indoor and outdoor space, they not only offer great food but also serve sheesha, which makes it the perfect spot for your Valentine’s day date. The outdoor sitting faces the golf course view, and we can vouch for how gorgeous it looks while maintaining an equally pretty indoor. They are centrally located and offer a variety of Asian food, Teppanyaki, and cocktails.   Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Truffle Enoki Tempura, Prawn Tempura, Exotic Mushroom Dumpling  Threesixtyone Degrees Threesixtyone Degrees - The Oberoi, Udyog Vihar, Gurgaon See On Map The ambience of Threesixtyone Degrees at The Oberoi Hotel in Gurgaon is utterly gorgeous and is a great spot for a memorable date. This all-day fine dining restaurant is very in-demand so make sure you call in and make a reservation. They have it all in store —Japanese, Chinese, Italian, and North Indian cuisines, as well as lip-smacking desserts.  Price For Two: INR 5,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Timings: 9 AM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Buffet, Chocolate Cake, Thai Curry, Salads, Dimsums, Virgin Mojito  Diggin Diggin, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Although Diggin is technically a cafe and not a fine dining restaurant, we believe that it's an extremely stunning option for a date night; especially at night because of all the pretty fairy lights they always have up. You can go here for their Italian dishes and we suggest that you try their Mutton Lasagna with Mushroom Calzone (vegetarians can go for vegetarian Lasagna, filled with mozzarella cheese and tomato concasse sauce), Margherita Pizza, and the Chocolate Brownie Shake.  Price For Two: INR 1,300 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 11 AM - 9:30 PM  Must-Try: Penne Picante, Tuna Melt Sandwich, Veg Cannelloni, Ferrero Rocher Milkshake, Chicken Crostini, Garden Burger  Comorin Comorin, DLF Phase - 5, Gurgaon See On Map From decor to menu Comorin is luxe in every aspect. The service is impeccable, the food menu is impressive, and they have an amazing bar menu too. There's even a curated shop of gourmet and lifestyle products within the premises and a coffee shop that serves some of the finest, artisanal coffee. The food here is a modern take on familiar classics from across the country without compromising on the flavour.  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.8/5  Timings: 12 AM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Champaran Style Mutton, Gunpowder Idli, Cocktails, Sev Puri, Haleem, Chocolate Dessert  Piano Man The Piano Man, Sector 15, Gurgaon See On Map Piano Man has three outlets: Gurgaon, Malviya Nagar and Safdarjung Enclave. They have awesome gigs lined up every day which makes it an even better place to drop by for date night for a dose of vibrant jazz music and a good drink. The Gurgaon branch has bright lights (245 trumpet chandelier, to be precise), a deep maroon curtain, wooden pews, and interiors that'll take you back to the 20's prohibition era!   Price For Two: INR 2000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 1 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Tomato Basil Spaghetti, Mimosa, Chicken Slider, Egg Sandwich, Spaghetti Pasta, Pepperoni Pizza  Kiyan Kiyan - The Roseate, New Delhi See On Map Kiyan at The Roseate is set in a beautiful green area with tall pillars and water that reflects its outdoor seating. Inside, you find more beauty in the service and presentation of the food. Popular dishes include Wild Mushroom Soup, Galouti Kebabs and Thai Curry.   Price For Two: INR 5,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 7 AM - 10:30 AM, 12:30 PM - 3 PM, 7 PM - 11:30 PM   Must-Try: Pomelo Salad, Thai Rice, Wild Mushroom Soup, Pad Thai, Galouti Kebab, Khichdi  Raise The Bar Raise The Bar Rooftop - Clarens Hotel, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map A rooftop lounge with great cocktails and an awesome ambience is all we really need for date night! Raise The Bar offers Continental, European and Italian with the perfect view.  Price For Two: INR 2,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 6 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Red Wine Sangria, Banoffee Pie, Cocktails, Sushi, Drinks, White Sauce Pasta  Jamun Jamun, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi See On Map With an admirable hue of pink all over the walls and relaxing music playing in the background, a date night at Jamun would surely be among your best-ever date nights. The place is great for the gram and is equally great for relishing in some delectable Mughlai cuisine.  Price For Two: INR 1,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 12 AM - 11:30 PM  Must Try: Aloo Tuk, Dahi Gol Gappa, Jamun Kulfi, Mutton Ghee Roast, Ghee Rice, Tandoori Tikka  Pro-Tip If you're running slightly low on cash and are looking for places that are easier on the pocket, we suggest you check out our guide here..
 Gender: man Qualities: Humble, Wise, Curious Persona Test: mentor Scenerio_test: 30 Restaurants & Cafés That Are Perfect For A Romantic Date Knowledge: 30 Restaurants & Cafés That Are Perfect For A Romantic Date img-user-muskan-bansal-778750405967 By Muskan 178747  Interested | 257K   Views Sometimes, all you need for a great night is you, your significant other, a great menu, a couple of delicious drinks and music you can vibe to. And these 30 restaurants in Delhi will give you just that. Let's be honest, we don't need no Valentine's day to go on a date.  Cafe De Flora Cafe De Flora, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map A newbie in town, this cafe is located in Chanakyapuri and is one of those places that goes big on festivities. So, on Valentine’s Day, you can expect the place to have all things hearty. It has a very Parisian vibe, and we are personally quite excited to try it out and have an Emily In Paris moment. We've heard their hot chocolate is a must-try. We think your date would be pleasantly surprised by the vibe of this place.  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.7/5  Timings: 11 AM - 9:30 PM  Must-Try: Hot Chocolate, Cheesecake, Pasta, Drinks  Olive Olive Bar & Kitchen, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map A recent dinner here with a girlfriend (Thank you, Leslie Knope, for bringing Galentines into our lives) helped us realise that it's the perfect spot for a chill and romantic time with your S.O. (or your Galentine?). Olive has revamped their menu and the outside is perfect for all kinds of dates.  Price For Two: INR 4,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Cheese Souffle, Fettucine, Scallops, Lobster, Gnocchi  Sevilla Sevilla - The Claridges, Aurangzeb Road, New Delhi See On Map Private canopies, enough candles and dim lighting can make any romance glow, and they've got one of the best menus in the capital. Again, on request, they will customise the menu, sprinkle rose petals, pop a bottle of champagne, and offer impeccable service. But be warned, you’re going to need to be plush with cash—Sevilla is pricey, with a capital P.  Price For Two: INR 4,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 7 PM -10:45 PM  Must-Try: Patata Bravas, Duck, Risotto, Sangria, Ravioli, Wine  Townhall Town Hall, Khan Market, New Delhi See On Map Best sushi, and definitely in the running for best black cod. Ask for a table on the terrace for the candles to really take effect, and on request, they’ll personalise the placard at your table. So, perhaps a 'Welcome <insert other half’s name>', waiting for you when you arrive? Two words: classy and romantic.  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM–11 PM  Must-Try: Spicy Edamame, Rock Shrimp Tempura, Non-Veg Mezze Platter, Crispy Lamb, Sushi Rolls  Le Cirque, The Leela Palace Le Cirque - The Leela Palace, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Le Cirque is the perfect place to go to if you're looking for a) a romantic setting and b) French and Italian food! We definitely recommend you give their Creme Brule, Morel Mushroom Risotto and maybe even Pumpkin soups a go. Also, do not forego their wines and cocktails because, well, romance, Valentine's and wine kind of go hand-in-hand.   Price For Two: INR 5,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 7 PM–11:30 PM  Must-Try: Morel Mushroom Risotto, Scallops, Wine, Cocktails, Desserts  Guppy Guppy, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi See On Map Did somebody say affordable and remarkable seafood? If you’re looking to step up your date night with some sushi, Guppy is your new pit stop. Their fresh food, enticing cocktails, and toothsome desserts ought to propel your romantic date night to another level. Their dimly lit yet colourful ambience is a treat to the eyes! You’d better put this on your go-to list for the 2024 Valentine's Day celebrations.  Price For Two: INR 2,700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 12 PM - 4:30 PM, 6 PM - 11:30 PM   Must-Try: Exotic Mushroom Gyoza, Grilled Jumbo Prawn, Artichoke Salad, Chicken Karaage, Salmon Salad, Pork Belly  Fio Cookhouse Fio Cookhouse & Bar, Nehru Place, New Delhi See On Map Be warned, on the weekends, Fio turns into a party pad, with very loud music after 10.30 PM, so plan for during the week, and early-ish. Tables outside are surrounded by a lot of greenery, wooden decks, and definitely let you forget you’re under a metro station. Also - cocktails. You’ll be glad the lighting is dim (read: romantic).   Price For Two: INR 3,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Chocolate Flan, Mushroom Croquette, Spinach Ravioli, Wild Mushroom Risotto, Tiramisu Jar, Banoffee Pie  Music & Mountains Music & Mountains Cafe, Greater Kailash - 1, New Delhi See On Map With its charming ambience and flavourful food, Music & Mountains makes it to this list. Expect candle-lit tables and some great music here, making this an ideal place for a romantic date. Go for a coffee at brunch or for Sangria at dinner, this place will never cease to leave you in awe.  Price For Two: INR 2,100 (approx.) From scrumptious food to amazing drinks, we would recommend you head here for a brunch date.  Price For Two: INR 1,600 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 8 AM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Berries Waffles, Tomato Bruscetta, Avoacdo Toast, Four Cheese Pizza    Maruchi Maruchi, Lado Sarai, New Delhi See On Map If you're looking for a space to get good food, ambience, and perhaps an ideal date, then Maruchi is the place for you. With a large indoor and outdoor space, they not only offer great food but also serve sheesha, which makes it the perfect spot for your Valentine’s day date. The outdoor sitting faces the golf course view, and we can vouch for how gorgeous it looks while maintaining an equally pretty indoor. They are centrally located and offer a variety of Asian food, Teppanyaki, and cocktails.   Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Truffle Enoki Tempura, Prawn Tempura, Exotic Mushroom Dumpling  Threesixtyone Degrees Threesixtyone Degrees - The Oberoi, Udyog Vihar, Gurgaon See On Map The ambience of Threesixtyone Degrees at The Oberoi Hotel in Gurgaon is utterly gorgeous and is a great spot for a memorable date. This all-day fine dining restaurant is very in-demand so make sure you call in and make a reservation. They have it all in store —Japanese, Chinese, Italian, and North Indian cuisines, as well as lip-smacking desserts.  Price For Two: INR 5,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Timings: 9 AM - 11 PM  Must-Try: Buffet, Chocolate Cake, Thai Curry, Salads, Dimsums, Virgin Mojito  Diggin Diggin, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Although Diggin is technically a cafe and not a fine dining restaurant, we believe that it's an extremely stunning option for a date night; especially at night because of all the pretty fairy lights they always have up. You can go here for their Italian dishes and we suggest that you try their Mutton Lasagna with Mushroom Calzone (vegetarians can go for vegetarian Lasagna, filled with mozzarella cheese and tomato concasse sauce), Margherita Pizza, and the Chocolate Brownie Shake.  Price For Two: INR 1,300 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 11 AM - 9:30 PM  Must-Try: Penne Picante, Tuna Melt Sandwich, Veg Cannelloni, Ferrero Rocher Milkshake, Chicken Crostini, Garden Burger  Comorin Comorin, DLF Phase - 5, Gurgaon See On Map From decor to menu Comorin is luxe in every aspect. The service is impeccable, the food menu is impressive, and they have an amazing bar menu too. There's even a curated shop of gourmet and lifestyle products within the premises and a coffee shop that serves some of the finest, artisanal coffee. The food here is a modern take on familiar classics from across the country without compromising on the flavour.  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.8/5  Timings: 12 AM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Champaran Style Mutton, Gunpowder Idli, Cocktails, Sev Puri, Haleem, Chocolate Dessert  Piano Man The Piano Man, Sector 15, Gurgaon See On Map Piano Man has three outlets: Gurgaon, Malviya Nagar and Safdarjung Enclave. They have awesome gigs lined up every day which makes it an even better place to drop by for date night for a dose of vibrant jazz music and a good drink. The Gurgaon branch has bright lights (245 trumpet chandelier, to be precise), a deep maroon curtain, wooden pews, and interiors that'll take you back to the 20's prohibition era!   Price For Two: INR 2000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 1 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Tomato Basil Spaghetti, Mimosa, Chicken Slider, Egg Sandwich, Spaghetti Pasta, Pepperoni Pizza  Kiyan Kiyan - The Roseate, New Delhi See On Map Kiyan at The Roseate is set in a beautiful green area with tall pillars and water that reflects its outdoor seating. Inside, you find more beauty in the service and presentation of the food. Popular dishes include Wild Mushroom Soup, Galouti Kebabs and Thai Curry.   Price For Two: INR 5,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 7 AM - 10:30 AM, 12:30 PM - 3 PM, 7 PM - 11:30 PM   Must-Try: Pomelo Salad, Thai Rice, Wild Mushroom Soup, Pad Thai, Galouti Kebab, Khichdi  Raise The Bar Raise The Bar Rooftop - Clarens Hotel, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map A rooftop lounge with great cocktails and an awesome ambience is all we really need for date night! Raise The Bar offers Continental, European and Italian with the perfect view.  Price For Two: INR 2,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 6 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Red Wine Sangria, Banoffee Pie, Cocktails, Sushi, Drinks, White Sauce Pasta  Jamun Jamun, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi See On Map With an admirable hue of pink all over the walls and relaxing music playing in the background, a date night at Jamun would surely be among your best-ever date nights. The place is great for the gram and is equally great for relishing in some delectable Mughlai cuisine.  Price For Two: INR 1,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 12 AM - 11:30 PM  Must Try: Aloo Tuk, Dahi Gol Gappa, Jamun Kulfi, Mutton Ghee Roast, Ghee Rice, Tandoori Tikka  Pro-Tip If you're running slightly low on cash and are looking for places that are easier on the pocket, we suggest you check out our guide here. -in output add short english leading thoughtful  questions at the end  relevent to 30 Restaurants & Cafés That Are Perfect For A Romantic Date img-user-muskan-bansal-778750405967 By Muskan 178747  Interested | 257K   Views Sometimes, all you need for a great night is you, your significant other, a great menu, a couple of delicious drinks and music you can vibe to. And these 30 restaurants in Delhi will give you just that. Let's be honest, we don't need no Valentine's day to go on a date.  Cafe De Flora Cafe De Flora, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map A newbie in town, this cafe is located in Chanakyapuri and is one of those places that goes big on festivities. So, on Valentine’s Day, you can expect the place to have all things hearty. It has a very Parisian vibe, and we are personally quite excited to try it out and have an Emily In Paris moment. We've heard their hot chocolate is a must-try. We think your date would be pleasantly surprised by the vibe of this place.  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.7/5  Timings: 11 AM - 9:30 PM  Must-Try: Hot Chocolate, Cheesecake, Pasta, Drinks  Olive Olive Bar & Kitchen, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map A recent dinner here with a girlfriend (Thank you, Leslie Knope, for bringing Galentines into our lives) helped us realise that it's the perfect spot for a chill and romantic time with your S.O. (or your Galentine?). Olive has revamped their menu and the outside is perfect for all kinds of dates.  Price For Two: INR 4,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Cheese Souffle, Fettucine, Scallops, Lobster, Gnocchi  Sevilla Sevilla - The Claridges, Aurangzeb Road, New Delhi See On Map Private canopies, enough candles and dim lighting can make any romance glow, and they've got one of the best menus in the capital. Again, on request, they will customise the menu, sprinkle rose petals, pop a bottle of champagne, and offer impeccable service. But be warned, you’re going to need to be plush with cash—Sevilla is pricey, with a capital P.  Price For Two: INR 4,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 7 PM -10:45 PM  Must-Try: Patata Bravas, Duck, Risotto, Sangria, Ravioli, Wine  Townhall Town Hall, Khan Market, New Delhi See On Map Best sushi, and definitely in the running for best black cod. Ask for a table on the terrace for the candles to really take effect, and on request, they’ll personalise the placard at your table. So, perhaps a 'Welcome <insert other half’s name>', waiting for you when you arrive? Two words: classy and romantic.  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM–11 PM  Must-Try: Spicy Edamame, Rock Shrimp Tempura, Non-Veg Mezze Platter, Crispy Lamb, Sushi Rolls  Le Cirque, The Leela Palace Le Cirque - The Leela Palace, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Le Cirque is the perfect place to go to if you're looking for a) a romantic setting and b) French and Italian food! We definitely recommend you give their Creme Brule, Morel Mushroom Risotto and maybe even Pumpkin soups a go. Also, do not forego their wines and cocktails because, well, romance, Valentine's and wine kind of go hand-in-hand.   Price For Two: INR 5,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 7 PM–11:30 PM  Must-Try: Morel Mushroom Risotto, Scallops, Wine, Cocktails, Desserts  Guppy Guppy, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi See On Map Did somebody say affordable and remarkable seafood? If you’re looking to step up your date night with some sushi, Guppy is your new pit stop. Their fresh food, enticing cocktails, and toothsome desserts ought to propel your romantic date night to another level. Their dimly lit yet colourful ambience is a treat to the eyes! You’d better put this on your go-to list for the 2024 Valentine's Day celebrations.  Price For Two: INR 2,700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 12 PM - 4:30 PM, 6 PM - 11:30 PM   Must-Try: Exotic Mushroom Gyoza, Grilled Jumbo Prawn, Artichoke Salad, Chicken Karaage, Salmon Salad, Pork Belly  Fio Cookhouse Fio Cookhouse & Bar, Nehru Place, New Delhi See On Map Be warned, on the weekends, Fio turns into a party pad, with very loud music after 10.30 PM, so plan for during the week, and early-ish. Tables outside are surrounded by a lot of greenery, wooden decks, and definitely let you forget you’re under a metro station. Also - cocktails. You’ll be glad the lighting is dim (read: romantic).   Price For Two: INR 3,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Chocolate Flan, Mushroom Croquette, Spinach Ravioli, Wild Mushroom Risotto, Tiramisu Jar, Banoffee Pie  Music & Mountains Music & Mountains Cafe, Greater Kailash - 1, New Delhi See On Map With its charming ambience and flavourful food, Music & Mountains makes it to this list. Expect candle-lit tables and some great music here, making this an ideal place for a romantic date. Go for a coffee at brunch or for Sangria at dinner, this place will never cease to leave you in awe.  Price For Two: INR 2,100 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Chicken Pot Pie, Mushroom Ravioli, Salami Pizza, Apple Crumble, Spinach Ravioli, Chicken Stroganoff  QLA Qla, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map If you're into Spanish, Italian, and Mediterranean cuisines and pretty outdoor seating covered in canopies, or just minimal wooden tables set up in fresh air, then QLA is where you should go (also QLA is legit known for its superb and romantic outdoor seating). You should also give their risotto and pasta a go for sure.  Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.1/5  Timings: 12 PM - 12 AM  Must-Try: Chicken Slider, Wine, Tiramisu, Cocktail, Sangria, Prawn  Sidecar Sidecar, Greater Kailash - 2, New Delhi See On Map If you really enjoy cocktails with dinner, we suggest you check out Sidecar. It's a great place to head to if you also enjoy cosy settings with nice, wooden tables and enjoy old style bars as an aesthetic. We say, you go here for good Asian and continental food, and do give their Thai Basil Chicken a go. For drinks, you should certainly try their Yang's Old Fashioned (if you're into bourbon).   Price For Two: INR 1,600 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 1 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Corn Curd, Avocado Toast, Lamb Curry, Cocktail, Drink, Dessert  Saffron Boutique The Saffron Boutique, Sector 104, Noida See On Map This Noida-based restaurant is perfect for great North Indian, Mughlai, and Chinese food. The interiors are super cute; the entire space has a vintage and cosy vibe (the wooden floors plus the pretty white chairs and tables are a testament to that). We recommend you try their dal makhani or butter chicken for sure.   Price For Two: INR 1,400 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 12 PM - 11:30 PM  Must-Try: Kesar Kheer, Roasted Pineapple, Chicken Lababdaar, Vegetable Spring Roll, Afghan Chicken, Laal Maas  Indian Accent Indian Accent - The Lodhi, Lodhi Road, New Delhi See On Map Indian Accent is the place to head to if you enjoy fine dining experiences and to probably celebrate something super special (your five-year anniversary, maybe?). If you're the kind who likes big glass windows and open, contemporary spaces, then this is the spot for you. But more importantly, you must try their dal makhani and Chur Chur Blue Cheese Naan. A meal here will definitely do some damage to your bank balance but hey, the meal will be one that you and your bae will always remember!   Price For Two: INR 5,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.9/5  Timings: 12 PM - 2 PM and 7 PM - 10:30 PM  Must-Try:  Sweet Corn Shorba, Mushroom Kulcha, Wine Cellar, Doda Barfi, Butter Chicken Kulcha, Chur Chur Parantha  Bo Tai Bo Tai, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map Bo Tai in the Qutub complex is a stunning space in Mehrauli. It has a unique spin on Thai food and does some pretty potent cocktails. The mood-lighting set-up that the place has is perfect for a romantic dinner date. Their menu is nothing short of delicious. We recommend you try their cocktails since it is known for it, especially their Full Moon Festival. However, all the other cocktails are equally good.   Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Crab Cake, Massaman Curry, Scallops, Avocado Salad, Crispy Prawns, Lamb Chops  The Spice Route, Imperial Hotel The Spice Route - The Imperial, Janpath, New Delhi See On Map With murals and antiques that reflect the roots of the historical spice route, serves food from the Malabar Coast in Kerala, Malaysia, Vietnam, Sri Lanka, Thailand, and Indonesia to reflect the journey of spices. The Spice Route is a rather unique experience for you to take your partner for this Valentine’s Day. With a beautiful ambience, it’s safe to say that it will be a win for your date.  Price For Two: INR 7,000 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 2:45 AM, 7 PM - 11:45 PM  Must-Try: Appam, Pad Thai, Stew, Wine, Spring Rolls, Desserts  Amour Bistro Amour Bistro, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Amour Bistro is perfect for Continental and Italian food. It's also got a super chic, industrial theme going inside; basically, imagine high loft ceilings, cobbled floors, and high, New York-style windows. Is that not tempting enough for y'all to plan a romantic date here? But when it comes to food, we recommend that you go ahead and try their pizza and pasta, specifically their Pesto and Mushroom Spaghetti, along with their Alligator (a cucumber, blueberry and orange-based cocktail).  Price For Two: INR 2,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 8 AM - 12 PM  Must-Try: Shephards Pie, Gnocchi, Quiche, Pork Ribs, Banoffee Pie, Blueberry Cheesecake  Gumbad Café Gumbad Cafe, Jama Masjid, New Delhi See On Map If you two are core romantics and would love to get the Gumbad (tomb) of Jama Masjid in the backdrop as you enjoy a beautiful evening, then you can head to Gumbad Café, which is famously known as a mini-Turkey or mini-Dubai for its view of the masjid which is up close and personal and not just that they’ve got some interesting food too. This turns out to be the ‘it’ spot of Delhi, lately. The view is incredible and has everything you need for your date night. However, the place is usually extremely crowded, so plan your date night accordingly.  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)   Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Soups, Shawarma Rolls, Signature Risotto, Kung Pao Chicken  Omo OMO Cafe, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map Omo is one of our favourite places to go for a soul-satisfying meal. They're a farm-to-fork concept with an earthy, minimalistic, and warm ambience located in Galleria, Gurgaon. We think it will be perfect for you if you two love clean-minimalistic ambience. Don't hesitate to ask the staff about recommendations, we've heard they're very well-versed with the menu, and no dish will disappoint.   Price For Two: INR 2,100 (approx.) Zomato Ratings: 4.6/5  Timings: 7 AM - 10:30 AM, 12:30 PM - 3 PM, 7 PM - 11:30 PM   Must-Try: Pomelo Salad, Thai Rice, Wild Mushroom Soup, Pad Thai, Galouti Kebab, Khichdi  Raise The Bar Raise The Bar Rooftop - Clarens Hotel, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map A rooftop lounge with great cocktails and an awesome ambience is all we really need for date night! Raise The Bar offers Continental, European and Italian with the perfect view.  Price For Two: INR 2,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Timings: 6 PM - 1 AM  Must-Try: Red Wine Sangria, Banoffee Pie, Cocktails, Sushi, Drinks, White Sauce Pasta  Jamun Jamun, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi See On Map With an admirable hue of pink all over the walls and relaxing music playing in the background, a date night at Jamun would surely be among your best-ever date nights. The place is great for the gram and is equally great for relishing in some delectable Mughlai cuisine.  Price For Two: INR 1,800 (approx.)
