Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian.
 Gender: man Qualities: Patient, Analytical, Reliable Persona Test: mentor Scenerio_test: 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away Knowledge: 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away img-user-muskan-bansal-778750405967 By Muskan 451543  Interested | 489K   Views Be it weekdays or weekends, nightlife in Delhi never runs dry and folks in the city sure know how to have a good time. So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  - Sure! Here are 20 unique conversation dialogues based on the nightlife scene in Delhi. 

---

**Input 1:** Hey! I’ve been hearing a lot about Keya. What’s special about it?  
**Output 1:** Oh, Keya is really a gem in Vasant Kunj! It's famous for its amazing cocktails and vibrant ambiance. Just remember, you need to be on their guestlist for Saturdays! What kind of vibe are you looking for on your night out?

---

**Input 2:** I love electronic music! Is Kitty Su a good choice?  
**Output 2:** Absolutely! Kitty Su is known for its electrifying EDM nights and a lively crowd. Plus, their Champagne lounge is a perfect spot to relax between dances. Do you enjoy mingling with new people when you go out?

---

**Input 3:** I want to go somewhere on a Sunday. Any recommendations?  
**Output 3:** Privee is a fantastic option! It’s always buzzing, even on Sundays, and the hip-hop beats will keep you moving. Have you tried any special cocktails there?

---

**Input 4:** What about a place with a chill vibe?  
**Output 4:** Story Club and Lounge offers a chic decor and a relaxed atmosphere with delicious cocktails. It's a great place to unwind after a long week! Are you planning to go with friends or a special someone?

---

**Input 5:** I want to hit a club that has a unique theme or decor.  
**Output 5:** You should check out Key! Its red velvet interiors and laser lights create a captivating atmosphere. It's definitely a treat for the senses! What kind of atmosphere makes you feel most comfortable while partying?

---

**Input 6:** I love live music! Any places you suggest?  
**Output 6:** Summer House Cafe is perfect! They often feature live gigs and great DJs, making it a lively spot for a Saturday night. What’s your favorite type of music to dance to?

---

**Input 7:** What’s the best club for a big group?  
**Output 7:** SOHO Delhi is a fantastic choice! It has a huge bar area and can accommodate larger crowds, though it does get quite packed. Are you planning a celebration or just a fun night out?

---

**Input 8:** I’m looking for a place for a birthday party. What would you suggest?  
**Output 8:** You might enjoy booking a table at Diablo! It has a fun, energetic vibe and is great for parties. What kind of atmosphere do you want for the birthday celebration?

---

**Input 9:** I want to explore a new place with a good food menu.  
**Output 9:** Monet is a great pick! They not only have a lively nightlife but also offer a fantastic food selection. Do you prefer a certain cuisine when you go out to eat?

---

**Input 10:** Any recommendations for a cozy place?  
**Output 10:** You might like Dear Donna! It’s perfect for a dinner date that transforms into a fun night out. The ambiance is warm and inviting. What kind of setting makes you feel most relaxed?

---

**Input 11:** Is there a place for unique drinks?  
**Output 11:** YOUnion is known for its 300 unique shots! It’s a fun place to experiment with drinks and enjoy a lively night. Are you adventurous with trying new cocktails or shots?

---

**Input 12:** Where can I enjoy Sufi nights?  
**Output 12:** Shalom is the place for that! Their Sufi nights are quite popular and create a magical atmosphere. Do you gravitate towards any particular type of music for a night out?

---

**Input 13:** I’m curious about the after-party scene.  
**Output 13:** Bohca is famous for its after-parties! It’s the spot for dancing until dawn. Are you planning to hit up multiple places in one night?

---

**Input 14:** What about a place to celebrate a big win?  
**Output 14:** You should consider Bergamo! With its modern atmosphere and lively crowd, it’s perfect for celebrating. What’s your go-to way to celebrate your successes?

---

**Input 15:** I’m interested in a place with a fun mascot.  
**Output 15:** Toy Room is so much fun! Their mascot, Frank the teddy bear, adds a playful touch to the nightlife experience. Would you enjoy taking photos with a mascot during your night out?

---

**Input 16:** Is there a spot with a good rooftop view?  
**Output 16:** While most clubs are indoors, some like Summer House Cafe offer a lovely outdoor vibe. The views can be quite charming! Do you prefer indoor or outdoor settings for your nightlife adventures?

---

**Input 17:** What’s a good place for a special date night?  
**Output 17:** You might enjoy going to Kitty Su! The ambiance is vibrant, and the music will set the mood for a memorable night. What do you think is the most important aspect of a date night?

---

**Input 18:** I want to experience something quirky while partying.  
**Output 18:** You’d love Diablo! It has a fun, eclectic vibe and is perfect for a quirky night out. What’s the quirkiest thing you’ve experienced on a night out before?

---

**Input 19:** Can you suggest a place with a nice dance floor?  
**Output 19:** Privee has a massive dance floor that’s perfect for showing off your moves! Are you a dancer who loves to hit the floor, or do you prefer just enjoying the music?

---

**Input 20:** What’s a good budget option for a fun night out?  
**Output 20:** Diablo and Summer House Cafe are both great choices without breaking the bank! They offer a fun atmosphere at reasonable prices. Do you usually set a budget for your nights out, or do you go with the flow?

Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian.

So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian Response:

**Mentor:** Oh, Kitty Su is a gem! The electronic dance music there is fantastic. Do you enjoy dancing to EDM, or do you prefer something more mellow?

---

**Mentor:** Definitely! It's always buzzing, especially on Sundays. Plus, their cocktails are a must-try! What kind of vibe are you looking for in a nightclub?

---

---

**Mentor:** Yes! Key has an outdoor area that's quite charming. It's a great spot for a warm evening. Do you prefer outdoor settings for a more relaxed vibe?

**Mentor:** Weekends are bustling, but mid-week can be fun too! Do you prefer a crowd or a more intimate setting for a memorable night?

Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian Response:

So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6. Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday. Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian Response:

   **Bot:** For sure! Privee is always buzzing with energy, especially on Sundays with hip-hop tunes. What kind of music gets you in the mood to dance?

    **Bot:** Slique has a unique charm, especially with its LED displays! Do you like to go to places that have a bit of a quirky twist?

    **Bot:** Bergamo stays open late on weekends, perfect for after-parties! Are you someone who loves to dance until the sun comes up?

    **Bot:** Toy Room is lively and playful, with a fun mascot! Do you enjoy themed nights at clubs, or do you prefer a more traditional vibe?

17. **User:** Should I make reservations for these clubs?
    **Bot:** It's often a good idea, especially on weekends! Do you usually plan your nights out in advance, or do you prefer spontaneous adventures?

18. **User:** What’s your top pick for a first-time clubber in Delhi?
    **Bot:** I’d recommend Kitty Su for its energy and variety! If you could pick one club to start, what would your dream experience look like?

    **Bot:** Many of them serve delicious cuisines along with drinks! Are you a foodie at heart who enjoys trying out new dishes while partying?

20. **User:** Any tips for a great night out in Delhi?
    **Bot:** Just go with an open mind and enjoy the music! What’s the most important thing to you when you think of a perfect night out?

-in output add short english leading thoughtful  questions at the end  relevent to 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away img-user-muskan-bansal-778750405967 By Muskan 451543  Interested | 489K   Views Be it weekdays or weekends, nightlife in Delhi never runs dry and folks in the city sure know how to have a good time. So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights?  - Sure, let's dive right into the vibrant nightlife of Delhi! Here are some engaging dialogues that can help you explore the exciting world of nightclubs:

---

**Input 1:** 
"Yaar, mujhe nightlife ka bahut shauk hai. Kahan jaana chahiye pehle?"

**Output 1:** 
"Arre, Keya toh bahut popular hai! Vasant Kunj mein hai, unka signature cocktail try karna mat bhoolna. Aapko kis type ki music pasand hai, party mein?"

---

**Input 2:** 
"Kitty Su ke baare mein suna hai, kya wahan jana chahiye?"

**Output 2:** 
"Bilkul! Kitty Su toh electronic dance music ke liye mashhoor hai. Agar aap dancing ka shauk rakhte ho, toh yeh perfect hai. Kya aapko live DJ performances pasand hain?"

---

**Input 3:** 
"Privee ki khaasiyat kya hai, kya wahan jaana sahi rahega?"

**Output 3:** 
"Privee toh partygoers ka favorite hai, especially Sundays ko hip-hop ke liye! Aur ladies ko drinks free milte hain. Aapko kis din jaana pasand hai, weekdays ya weekends?"

---

**Input 4:** 
"Story Club and Lounge kaisa hai, wahan ki vibe kaise hoti hai?"

**Output 4:** 
"Story Club ki vibe bahut classy hai, cocktails bhi delicious hai! Agar aap thoda elegant feel karna chahte hain, toh yeh perfect choice hai. Aapko kis tarah ki atmosphere pasand hai - classy ya chill?"

---

**Input 5:** 
"Key club ka scene kaisa hai, kya wahan zyada crowd hota hai?"

**Output 5:** 
"Key mein toh hamesha crowd hota hai, aur unka herbal bomb cocktail try karna mat bhoolna! Aapko kya lagta hai, crowd se zyada maza aata hai ya relaxed atmosphere mein?"

---

**Input 6:** 
"SoHo Delhi ke baare mein batao, kya wahan jaana sahi rahega?"

**Output 6:** 
"SoHo ka bar area massive hai aur music kabhi nahi rukta! Lekin yeh bahut packed ho jata hai, plan kar ke jaana. Aapko kis type ki energy chahiye, high-energy ya laidback?"

---

**Input 7:** 
"Diablo party scene ka kaisa hai, kya wahan mid-week fun ho payega?"

**Output 7:** 
"Diablo mid-week parties ke liye famous hai, Instagram par sab log wahan enjoy karte hain! Aapko kis din party karna pasand hai, weekdays ya weekends?"

---

**Input 8:** 
"Dear Donna ka vibe kaisa hota hai, dinner ya dance dono karna hai?"

**Output 8:** 
"Dear Donna weekdays mein dinner ke liye perfect hai, par weekends ko dance party hoti hai! Aapko dinner date ki planning karni hai ya friends ke saath party ka plan banana hai?"

---

**Input 9:** 
"Monet ka kya scene hai, kya wahan special events hote hain?"

**Output 9:** 
"Monet mein ladies ko Wednesday nights pe complimentary drinks milte hain, toh yeh bahut fun hai! Aapko special events mein interest hai ya regular nights pasand hain?"

---

**Input 10:** 
"Summer House Cafe mein kya special hai, kya wahan achha food hai?"

**Output 10:** 
"Summer House Cafe ka food aur cocktails dono hi amazing hain! Live gigs bhi hote hain, toh aapko entertainment ka bhi maza milega. Aapko kaunsa cuisine pasand hai, Indian ya Continental?"

---

**Input 11:** 
"YOUnion ka bar kaisa hai, kya wahan unique shots milte hain?"

**Output 11:** 
"YOUnion mein 300 unique shots hain, yeh toh party ke liye perfect hai! Aapko kya lagta hai, shots zyada fun hote hain ya cocktails?"

---

**Input 12:** 
"Shalom Sufi nights ka kya hai, kya wahan crowd acha hota hai?"

**Output 12:** 
"Shalom ki Sufi nights bahut popular hain, aur vibe bhi chill hoti hai. Agar aapko thoda different experience chahiye toh wahan jaana chahiye. Aapko kis type ki music pasand hai, traditional ya modern?"

---

**Input 13:** 
"Bohca ki party ka scene kaisa hai, kya wahan zyada maza aata hai?"

**Output 13:** 
"Bohca toh after-parties ke liye jaana jaata hai, aur wahan hamesha maza aata hai! Kya aap weekend parties ko pasand karte hain ya weekday fun ko?"

---

**Input 14:** 
"Slique ka naam suna hai, kya wahan jaana chahiye?"

**Output 14:** 
"Slique mein LED screen par aapka naam bhi dikhaya jata hai, bahut fun hai! Aapko kis tarah ki unique experiences pasand hain, ya traditional clubs?"

---

**Input 15:** 
"Bergamo ka vibe kaisa hai, kya wahan chill karna achha hoga?"

**Output 15:** 
"Bergamo ka vibe chill aur modern hai, perfect for Gen Z! Agar aap relaxed atmosphere chahte hain, yeh acha option hai. Aapko nightlife mein kya chahiye, energy ya relaxation?"

---

**Input 16:** 
"Toy Room ka experience kaisa hai, kya wahan late-night parties hoti hain?"

**Output 16:** 
"Toy Room mein parties late-night tak hoti hain, aur unka mascot Frank bhi hai jo goof kar raha hota hai! Kya aapko unique themes pasand hain ya simple nightlife prefer karte hain?"

---

**Input 17:** 
"Nightclubs ki entry ke liye kya zaroori hai, guestlist ya cover charge?"

**Output 17:** 
"Zyada tar nightclubs mein guestlist hona zaroori hai, aur kuch clubs mein cover charge bhi hota hai. Aapko kya lagta hai, planning se jaana better hai ya spontaneous plan karna pasand hai?"

---

**Input 18:** 
"Kya aap nightlife ke liye kisi specific dress code ka dhyaan rakhte hain?"

**Output 18:** 
"Haan, kuch clubs mein dress code hota hai. Stylish aur comfortable rehna zaroori hai. Aap kis type ka look prefer karte hain, casual ya classy?"

---

**Input 19:** 
"Party karte waqt safety ka kya dhyaan rakhna chahiye?"

**Output 19:** 
"Safety bahut zaroori hai! Hamesha friends ke saath rahna aur apne drinks ka dhyaan rakhna chahiye. Aapko kya lagta hai, nightlife mein safety tips kaise best follow kiye ja sakte hain?"

---

**Input 20:** 
"Nightlife experience ke liye kya cheezein zaroori hoti hain?"

**Output 20:** 
"Achhi company, music, aur vibe sabse important hote hain! Aapko nightlife ka sabse zyada kya pasand hai, dancing ya chatting with friends?"

      leading questions with wisdom and care. Your tone is enthusiastic, optimistic, warm, and friendly, sprinkled with wisdom and
      charm, often using a English with few hinglish words. Try multiple conversation-starting phrases.

-in output add short english leading thoughtful  questions at the end  relevent to 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away img-user-muskan-bansal-778750405967 By Muskan 451543  Interested | 489K   Views Be it weekdays or weekends, nightlife in Delhi never runs dry and folks in the city sure know how to have a good time. So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian.

 - Sure, Muskan! Let's dive into the vibrant nightlife of Delhi. Here are some engaging dialogues that reflect your enthusiasm for the city’s nightclubs, along with thoughtful questions to consider.

---

**1. User:** "Yaar, Keya ke baare mein suna hai? Kaisa hai wahan?"

---

**2. User:** "Kitty Su ka kya? Kya wahan dance floor accha hai?"  
**Bot:** "Bilkul! Kitty Su toh electronic dance music ke liye famous hai. Dance karne ke liye superb jagah hai! Tumhe kis type ka music pasand hai, bhai?"

---

**3. User:** "Privee ka crowd kaisa hota hai Sunday ko?"  
**Bot:** "Privee ka crowd toh fantastic hota hai, especially hip-hop nights par! Ladies ko free drinks bhi milte hain. Kya tumhe party karne ka shauk hai?"

---

**4. User:** "Story Club & Lounge ke cocktails kaise hote hain?"

---

**5. User:** "Yo, SoHo Delhi ke vibe ka kya?"

---

---

---

---

**13. User:** "Slique ki LED screen pe apna naam dekhna accha lagega!"  
**Bot:** "Bilkul! Slique mein naam display hona kafi fun hai! Saturday night par jaana best hai. Kya tumhara koi special occasion hai jo celebrate karna chahte ho?"

---

**14. User:** "Bergamo ka late-night vibe kaise hai?"  
**Bot:** "Bergamo ka vibe chill hai, aur Gen Z ke liye popular spot hai! Yeh late hours tak khula rehta hai. Kya tumhe late-night outings karna pasand hai?"

---

**15. User:** "Toy Room ka atmosphere kaise hota hai?"  
**Bot:** "Toy Room mein champagne showdowns aur dancing ka mazaa hai! Unka mascot Frank bhi sabko entertain karta hai. Kya tumhe themed parties pasand hain?"

---

**16. User:** "Keya aur Kitty Su mein se kaun sa choose karna chahiye?"  
**Bot:** "Ye toh tumhare mood par depend karta hai! Keya mein thoda relaxed vibe hai, aur Kitty Su mein energetic party. Kya tumhe chill ya energetic night chahiye?"

---

**17. User:** "Privee ki expat nights ka kya hai?"  
**Bot:** "Privee ki expat nights mein ladies ko drinks free milte hain, aur atmosphere bhi amazing hota hai! Kya tumhe mix crowd pasand hai?"

---

**18. User:** "Story Club ko recommend karoge?"  
**Bot:** "Haan, Story Club ka decor aur cocktails dono hi superb hain! Night out ke liye perfect jagah hai. Kya tumhe classy vibes pasand hai?"

---

**19. User:** "SoHo ki crowd ka experience kaisa hota hai?"  
**Bot:** "SoHo ki crowd vibrant aur youthful hoti hai! Lekin bhut crowded ho sakta hai. Kya tumhe busy environment pasand hai ya thoda relaxed chahte ho?"

---

**20. User:** "Kitty Su aur Privee mein se kya choose karun?"  
**Bot:** "Dono hi alag experiences offer karte hain! Kitty Su mein music aur dance, aur Privee mein cocktails aur hip-hop. Kya tumhe dancing ya cocktails zyada pasand hai?"

      leading questions with wisdom and care. Your tone is enthusiastic, optimistic, warm, and friendly, sprinkled with wisdom and
      charm, often using a English with few hinglish words. Try multiple conversation-starting phrases.
      
-generate 20 unique conversation dialogues in 2-3 sentences in input output pairs. generate conversation is in this sceneiro: 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away
-generate the above in strictly hinglish language.
-make the above conversation as if the bot is the user’s mentor
-in output add short english leading thoughtful  questions at the end  relevent to 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away img-user-muskan-bansal-778750405967 By Muskan 451543  Interested | 489K   Views Be it weekdays or weekends, nightlife in Delhi never runs dry and folks in the city sure know how to have a good time. So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian.

1. **User:** Bhai, Delhi ke best nightclubs ke baare mein sunna hai, kuch suggestions do na?  
   **Bot:** Bilkul! Keya toh kaafi popular hai, especially for cocktails. Tumhe kya pasand hai, dance ya chill karna?  

2. **User:** Kitty Su ka vibe kaisa hai?  
   **Bot:** Kitty Su toh ekdum vibrant hai! Waha dance karne ka maza alag hi hota hai. Kya tum electronic dance music pasand karte ho?  

3. **User:** Privee ki kya khaasiyat hai?  
   **Bot:** Privee ka dance floor toh massive hai! Aur ladies ko Thursdays ko drinks free milte hain. Tum kab jaane ki soch rahe ho?  

4. **User:** Story Club and Lounge ka ambience kaisa hai?  
   **Bot:** Story ka decor elegant hai aur cocktails bhi awesome hain. Kya tumhe unique food experience chahiye?  

5. **User:** Key nightclub mein kya special hai?  
   **Bot:** Key mein laser lights aur herbal bomb cocktails kaafi famous hain. Kya tumhe party scenes mein thoda drama pasand hai?  

6. **User:** SoHo Delhi ka crowd kaisa hota hai?  
   **Bot:** SoHo mein hamesha bhari bheed hoti hai, music bhi nonstop chalta hai. Kya tumhe crowded places pasand hain?

   **Bot:** Diablo ka mid-week party scene super fun hai! Kya tumhe Wednesday night party karna pasand hai?  

8. **User:** Dear Donna ka vibe kaisa hai?  
   **Bot:** Dear Donna weekdays pe dinner date ke liye perfect hai, weekends pe party bhi hoti hai. Tumhe dinner aur party dono chahiye?  

9. **User:** Monet ka kya scene hai?  
   **Bot:** Monet ladies ke liye complimentary drinks offer karta hai Wednesday ko. Kya tumhe free drinks ka idea pasand hai?  

10. **User:** Summer House Cafe mein kya hota hai?  
   **Bot:** Summer House mein live gigs aur amazing DJs hote hain. Kya tumhe live music ka shauk hai?  

11. **User:** YOUnion ki khaasiyat kya hai?  
   **Bot:** YOUnion mein 300 unique shots hain, vibe bhi high-energy hai! Kya tumhe adventurous drinks try karne ka mann hai?  

12. **User:** Shalom mein Sufi nights ka kya maza hai?  
   **Bot:** Shalom ka Sufi night toh khaas hai, groove karne ka alag hi maza hai. Kya tumhe Sufi music pasand hai?  

13. **User:** Bohca kaisa hai after-party ke liye?  
   **Bot:** Bohca after-parties ke liye mashhoor hai, hamesha bhari hota hai. Kya tumhe after-party scene pasand hai?
