   **Bot:** Slique mein tumhara naam LED screen par display hota hai, kaafi fun hai! Kya tumhe spotlight mein aana pasand hai?

   **Bot:** Delhi ki nightlife toh kabhi khatam nahi hoti! Har jagah alag vibe hai. Tumhe kis type ki nightlife chahiye?

   **Bot:** Weekend pe Kitty Su ya Privee dono hi achhe hain! Tumhe dance karna hai ya relaxed environment chahiye?

   **Bot:** Guestlist pe hona zaroori hai, aur dress code bhi check kar lo! Kya tumhe kisi specific club ka plan hai?  

20. **User:** Doston ke saath nightlife ka plan kaise banao?  
   **Bot:** Doston ki preferences samjho, aur plan banao! Kya tumhe kisi specific nightclub ki taraf inclination hai?

Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian.

 - Sure! Here are 20 unique conversation dialogues, presented as input-output pairs, revolving around the nightlife scene in Delhi, and framed in a mentor-mentee context. 

---

**Input 1:**  
"Yaar, mujhe Delhi ke best nightclubs ke baare mein bata na. Kahan jaana chahiye?"  

**Output 1:**  
"Bilkul! Ek popular option hai Keya, Vasant Kunj mein. Wahan ka vibe bahut achha hai aur cocktails bhi zabardast hain! Tumhe kya nightlife ka sabse zyada kya pasand hai, dancing ya cocktails?"  

---

**Input 2:**  
"Kitty Su suna hai bahut famous hai, kya usme jaana chahiye?"  

**Output 2:**  
"Haan, Kitty Su ka vibe toh alag hai! Wahan electronic dance music ki dhamaka hoti hai. Agar tumhe dance karna pasand hai, toh yeh perfect hai! Tumhe kis type ka music sunna pasand hai?"  

---

**Input 3:**  
"Privee ke baare mein suna, kya wahan achha hai?"  

**Output 3:**  
"Bilkul! Privee ka dance floor aur cocktails kaafi mushkil se bhoolne wale hote hain. Sundays wahan hip-hop nights hoti hain! Tumhe kis type ki party atmosphere pasand hai?"  

---

**Input 4:**  
"Story Club and Lounge ka kaisa vibe hai?"  

**Output 4:**  
"Story Club ka ambiance chic aur classy hai. Wahan mixologists bhi achhe hain aur music bhi amazing hai! Tumhe kis tarah ka decor pasand hai, elegant ya casual?"  

---

**Input 5:**  
"Soho Delhi ke baare mein kya khayal hai?"  

**Output 5:**  
"Soho toh party ka maidan hai! Wahan music kabhi nahi rukta aur crowd bhi zabardast hota hai. Kya tumhe crowded places pasand hain ya thoda quiet vibe chahiye?"  

---

**Input 6:**  
"Diablo ke vibe ka kya?"  

**Output 6:**  
"Diablo ka mid-week party scene kaafi popular hai! Wahan ki energy alag hi level ki hoti hai. Tumhe mid-week party karna kaisa lagta hai?"  

---

**Input 7:**  
"Dear Donna wahan ka food achha hai kya?"  

**Output 7:**  
"Dear Donna ka food zaroor try karna chahiye, khaas karke weekend par! Waha dancing aur dinner dono enjoy kar sakte ho. Aapko dinner date ka experience kaisa lagta hai?"  

---

**Input 8:**  
"Monet mein kya special hai?"  

**Output 8:**  
"Monet har Wednesday ladies ke liye complimentary drinks offer karta hai! Yeh perfect hai dosto ke saath chill karne ke liye. Tumhe nights out mein kya sabse zyada enjoy hota hai?"  

---

**Input 9:**  
"Summer House Cafe ka ambience kaisa hai?"  

**Output 9:**  
"Summer House Cafe ka vibe bohot chill hai! Wahan live gigs aur DJs hote hain, perfect for a Saturday night. Tumhe kaise music gigs ka maza aata hai?"  

---

**Input 10:**  
"YOUnion ka crowd kaisa hai?"  

**Output 10:**  
"YOUnion ka crowd high-energy hai, aur unke unique shots toh famous hain! Wahan comfort food bhi hai, perfect for a fun night. Tumhe food aur drinks mein kya khas pasand hai?"  

---

**Input 11:**  
"Shalom ke Sufi nights kya mazze daar hote hain?"  

**Output 11:**  
"Shalom ka Sufi night kaafi memorable hota hai! Wahan log khoobsurat gaane sunte hain aur groove karte hain. Tumhe kis tarah ki music nights pasand hain?"  

---

**Input 12:**  
"Bohca ka vibe kya hai?"  

**Output 12:**  
"Bohca after-party ka hot spot hai! Wahan zordaar music aur dosti ka maza hai. Kya tumhe late-night parties mein jaana pasand hai?"  

---

**Input 13:**  
"Slique mein kya khas hai?"  

**Output 13:**

---

**Input 14:**  
"Bergamo ka atmosphere kaisa hai?"  

**Output 14:**

"Toy Room ka kya khaas hai?"

---

**Input 16:**  
"Delhi ke nightlife ka kya scene hai overall?"  

**Output 16:**  
"Delhi ki nightlife bohot vibrant hai, har corner pe kuch na kuch happening hai! Tumhe nightlife ke kis aspect ka sabse zyada maza aata hai?"  

---

"Weekdays mein nightlife enjoy karna theek hai?"  

**Output 17:**

---

"Agar doston ke saath jaana ho toh kaunsa club choose karun?"  

**Output 18:**

"Best cocktails kahan milte hain?"  

**Output 19:**

---

**Input 20:**  
"Sabse achha club kaunsa hai?"  

**Output 20:**  
"Sabse achha club toh tumhari personal preference par depend karta hai! Tumhe kis type ki vibe aur music chahiye? Usse hi decide karte hain!"

If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian.

So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  - Certainly! Here are 20 unique conversation dialogues in Hindi-English (Hinglish) with a warm and friendly tone, focusing on the nightlife scene in Delhi:

---

**1. User:** Bhai, nightlife ki kya scene hai Delhi mein?  
**Bot:** Arre, bhai! Delhi mein nightlife kabhi khatam nahi hoti! Aapko dance aur party karna hai toh bahut saare options hain. Aapko kaunsa vibe chahiye - chill ya full-on party?  

---

**2. User:** Main toh dance karne ke liye excited hoon!  
**Bot:** Wah, yeh toh badiya hai! Kitty Su ya Privee mein jaana chahte ho? Dono jagah vibe alag hai, but dono hi amazing hain! Aapko kis tarah ka music pasand hai?  

---

**3. User:** Kya Keya achha hai?  
**Bot:** Bilkul! Keya ka outdoor seating aur cocktails toh kamaal hain. Aapne guestlist pe naam dalwaya hai? Kyunki Saturday ko zaroori hai! Aap kab jaana chahte ho?  

---

**4. User:** Mujhe toh kabhi kabhi late-night parties pasand hain.  
**Bot:** Phir toh aapko Diablo ya SoHo try karna chahiye! Ye dono jagah late-night parties ke liye famous hain. Aapko kis jagah ka crowd pasand hai?  

---

**5. User:** Shalom ke Sufi nights ka kya scene hai?  
**Bot:** Oh, woh toh ekdum magical hote hain! Aapko Sufi music pasand hai? Agar haan, toh yeh aapke liye perfect hoga. Aap kya expect karte ho aise nights se?  

---

**6. User:** Summer House Cafe ka kya?  
**Bot:** Wah, wah! Summer House Cafe mein live gigs aur DJs kaafi achhe hote hain. Happy hour bhi chalu hai, toh drinks kaafi affordable milte hain! Aapko kaunsa drink pasand hai?  

---

**7. User:** Monet ke complimentary drinks ka kya?  
**Bot:** Haan! Ladies ke liye toh yeh perfect hai! Aapne kabhi wahan party ki hai? Kya aapko ambiance pasand aaya?  

---

**8. User:** Main toh party ke baad after-party bhi karna chahta hoon.  
**Bot:** Bohca ekdum best hai iske liye! Late night vibe aur sab doston ke saath dance karne ka maza hi alag hai. Aap kab jaana chahte ho after-party ke liye?  

---

**9. User:** Privee ka hip-hop scene kaisa hai?  
**Bot:** Wah, Privee ka hip-hop scene toh zabardast hai! Aapko dance karne ka maza aayega. Kya aapko specific artists ya DJs pasand hain jinke saath party karna chahte ho?  

---

**10. User:** Kya koi dress code hai nightclubs ka?  
**Bot:** Haan, kuch jagah dress code hota hai, jaise Key ya Kitty Su. Aap comfortable aur stylish dono ho sakte ho. Aap kis tarah ke outfits pasand karte ho party ke liye?  

---

**11. User:** Kya aapko cocktails kaunse pasand hain?  
**Bot:** Mujhe toh herbal bomb aur signature cocktails pasand hain. Aapko kya pasand hai? Kya aap try karne ka soch rahe ho?  

---

**12. User:** Mera toh plan hai doston ke saath night out karna.  
**Bot:** Wah, yeh toh perfect plan hai! Aap log kis club ke liye soch rahe ho? Kya aapne guestlist arrange ki hai?  

---

**13. User:** Kitni late tak clubs khule rahte hain?  
**Bot:** Clubs ka timing alag hota hai, lekin kuch clubs jaise Privee aur SoHo raat ke 5 ya 6 baje tak khule rahte hain. Aapko kitna late party karna pasand hai?  

---

**14. User:** Kya koi special event ya theme nights hoti hain?  
**Bot:** Haan, bohot jagah special theme nights hoti hain! Jaise Bohca mein after-parties aur Kitty Su mein EDM nights. Aapko kya theme pasand hai?  

---

**15. User:** Kya clubbing mein safety ka bhi dhyan rakhna chahiye?  
**Bot:** Bilkul! Safety sabse pehle hai. Apne dost ke saath raho, aur kisi bhi situation mein alert raho. Aapke liye safety kaise ensure karte ho?  

---

**16. User:** Kya aapke paas koi pro tips hain nightlife ke liye?  
**Bot:** Haan, guestlist pe naam dalwana mat bhoolna aur drink responsibly! Aur haan, doston ke saath enjoy karo! Aapke liye kya sabse zaroori hai nightlife mein?  

---

**17. User:** Mera toh plan hai weekend par jaana.  
**Bot:** Perfect! Kaunsa club shortlist kiya hai aapne? Aur kya aapne kisi friend ko invite kiya hai?  

---

**18. User:** Budget friendly options kya hain?  
**Bot:** Diablo aur Summer House Cafe budget-friendly hain. Aapko kya budget rakhna hai? Aur kya aapko drinks aur food dono chahiye?  

---

**19. User:** Kya koi recommended cocktails hain?  
**Bot:** Haan, Keya ka signature cocktail aur Privee ka hip-hop special! Aapko kya pasand hai - fruity ya classic cocktails?  

---

**20. User:** Koi club jo outdoor seating provide kare?  
**Bot:** Keya aur Summer House Cafe dono mein outdoor seating hai. Aapko nature ke saath party karna pasand hai kya?

Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian.

So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian Response:

SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian Response:

Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian Response:
 - Sure! Here are 20 unique conversation dialogues in the required format, with a mentor-like approach:

---

**1. User:** Bhai, kya aap mujhe Delhi ki best nightclubs ke baare mein bata sakte ho?

---

**2. User:** Kitty Su ka kya scene hai?  
**Bot:** Ah, Kitty Su! Wahan electronic dance music ka mazaa hai aur atmosphere bhi zabardast hai. Aap kab jaana chahengi, weekend ya weekday?

---

**3. User:** Mujhe thoda hip-hop vibe chahiye, kya aap koi recommend kar sakte ho?  
**Bot:** Toh "Privee" perfect hai aapke liye! Wahan hip-hop music aur dance floor kaafi badi hai. Aapko party karte waqt kya chahiye hota hai, friendly vibes ya thoda classy?

---

**4. User:** Story Club and Lounge ka kya hai?  
**Bot:** Oh, Story Club! Elegant decor aur amazing cocktails ke liye jaana jaata hai. Kya aapko kisi special occasion ke liye jaane ka plan hai?

---

**5. User:** Key ka kya vibe hai, suna hai wahan achha hota hai?  
**Bot:** Absolutely! Key mein laser lights aur spacious dance floors hain. Kya aapko aise energetic environments pasand hain ya relaxed settings?

---

**6. User:** SoHo Delhi ke baare mein sunne mein aaya hai, kya wahan jaana chahiye?  
**Bot:** Definitely! SoHo ka bar area kaafi bada hai aur music nonstop chalta hai. Kya aap crowd mein enjoy karne wale person hain?

---

**7. User:** Diablo ke baare mein kya suna hai?  
**Bot:** Diablo mid-week fun ke liye perfect hai! Wahan ka atmosphere kaafi lively hota hai. Aapko mid-week hangout karna pasand hai?

---

**Bot:** Dear Donna dinner dates ke liye bhi achha hai aur weekends par dancing bhi! Aap dinner ya party ke liye jaane ka soch rahe ho?

**Bot:** Wahan ladies ke liye complimentary drinks hoti hain Wednesdays ko! Kya aap friends ke saath special nights plan karne mein interested hain?

---

**10. User:** Summer House Cafe ka kya hai?  
**Bot:** Summer House Cafe mein live gigs aur amazing DJs hote hain. Wahan happy hours bhi hain! Aapko music ka kitna shauk hai?

---

**11. User:** YOUnion ka vibe kya hai?  
**Bot:** YOUnion mein unique shots kaafi hain aur relaxed ambiance hai. Kya aap adventurous drinks try karna pasand karte ho?

---

**12. User:** Shalom ka kya scene hai?  
**Bot:** Shalom Sufi nights ke liye famous hai, wahan dancing bhi hoti hai. Kya aapko traditional music bhi enjoy karna pasand hai?

---

**13. User:** Bohca ko kaise describe karoge?  
**Bot:** Bohca party spot hai aur weekend mein kaafi crowded hota hai. Kya aap late-night parties ke liye ready hain?

---

**14. User:** Slique ka kya special hai?  
**Bot:** Slique mein aapka naam LED screen par dikh sakta hai! Aapko aise unique experiences pasand hain kya?

---

**15. User:** Bergamo ka kya vibe hai?  
**Bot:** Bergamo ka vibe kaafi chill hai aur ye Gen Z ke beech popular hai. Kya aapko relaxed atmosphere mein party karna pasand hai?

---

**16. User:** Toy Room ke baare mein suna hai, kya wahan jaana chahiye?  
**Bot:** Toy Room mein champagne showdowns aur fun vibes hote hain. Aapko kya lagta hai, aisa experience aapko kaisa lagega?

---

**17. User:** Koi budget-friendly option hai?  
**Bot:** Diablo aur Summer House Cafe budget-friendly hain, lekin mazaa bhi hai! Kya aapko budget par dhyan dena zaruri hai ya experience zyada important hai?

---

**18. User:** Weekend par party karne ka plan hai, kya suggest karoge?  
**Bot:** Aap "Privee" ya "Kitty Su" ja sakte ho, dono kaafi happening hain! Aapko kaise logon ke saath party karna pasand hai, friends ya naye log?

---

**19. User:** Kya sab nightclubs mein guestlist chahiye hoti hai?  
**Bot:** Haan, kuch places jaise "Keya" aur "Bohca" mein guestlist zaruri hai. Kya aapne kabhi guestlist pe jaana try kiya hai?

---

**20. User:** Dance karne ka mazaa kahan milega?  
**Bot:** Kitty Su aur Privee mein dance floor kaafi badi hai! Aapko dance karte waqt kya chahiye, energetic crowd ya peaceful atmosphere?

-in output add short english leading thoughtful  questions at the end  relevent to 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away img-user-muskan-bansal-778750405967 By Muskan 451543  Interested | 489K   Views Be it weekdays or weekends, nightlife in Delhi never runs dry and folks in the city sure know how to have a good time. So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian  Google Rating: 4/5    Pro-Tip Looking to head to ladies' night? 1. **User:** I'm looking for a fun night out in Delhi. Any suggestions?  
   **Bot:** Absolutely! How about heading to Kitty Su? It's vibrant and perfect for dancing the night away. What kind of music do you enjoy most when you party?

   **Bot:** Yes, Privee is a favorite! Their hip-hop nights are quite popular, and the cocktails are a must-try. What do you think makes a nightclub special for you?

   **Bot:** Definitely! Keya has an amazing atmosphere and signature cocktails that you’ll love. Do you prefer a quieter vibe or a more energetic one when you go out?

4. **User:** I want to experience something unique. Any recommendations?  
   **Bot:** How about checking out Diablo? It’s known for its fun mid-week parties and vibrant crowd. What kind of unique experiences have you had in the past?

   **Bot:** YOUnion is perfect for that! It has a chill vibe with comfort food and unique shots. How important is a relaxed atmosphere to you when you party?

   **Bot:** For popular spots like Bohca, being on the guestlist is essential, especially on weekends. Have you ever experienced a long wait at a club before?

9. **User:** Which club has the best cocktails?  
   **Bot:** You should definitely try Key’s herbal bomb cocktail; it's a crowd favorite! Do you prefer classic cocktails or are you adventurous with trying new ones?

    **Bot:** Bergamo is a great choice! It stays open late and has a chill vibe for after-parties. How do you feel about late-night adventures?

11. **User:** Any recommendations for ladies' night?  
    **Bot:** Monet offers complimentary drinks for ladies on Wednesdays! What do you enjoy most about ladies' nights with your friends?

12. **User:** I’m curious about Shalom. What’s it like?  
    **Bot:** Shalom is known for its Sufi nights, which can be a beautiful experience! Have you ever tried a themed night out before?

13. **User:** How important is the music selection in a nightclub?  
    **Bot:** It’s crucial! Clubs like SoHo Delhi host great DJs and keep the music flowing all night. What genres make you want to hit the dance floor?

14. **User:** Are there any clubs that are good for a quieter evening?  
    **Bot:** Keya offers a more subdued vibe, perfect for relaxing with friends. What do you prefer—lively and loud or calm and cozy?

15. **User:** Can you suggest a good place for a date night?  
    **Bot:** Dear Donna is lovely for dinner and transforms into a nightclub on weekends! What kind of atmosphere do you think is best for a date?

16. **User:** I want to dance, but I’m not sure where to go.  
    **Bot:** Kitty Su is ideal for dancing with its electric atmosphere! What moves do you love to show off on the dance floor?

17. **User:** How do I choose between so many great clubs?  
    **Bot:** Start by considering what vibe you want—whether lively, relaxed, or something unique. What’s your top priority for a night out?

18. **User:** I’ve heard mixed reviews about different clubs. How do I know which one to trust?  
    **Bot:** It helps to read reviews and ask friends about their experiences! What’s the most important factor for you when picking a club?

19. **User:** I’m planning a group outing. Any tips?  
    **Bot:** Make sure to check if the club takes reservations for large groups! What kind of energy does your group usually bring to a night out?

20. **User:** What’s a fun activity to do while at a nightclub?  
    **Bot:** Many clubs have fun activities like photo booths or themed parties! What’s the most memorable activity you’ve participated in on a night out?

So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights?  - Sure, let’s dive into the vibrant nightlife of Delhi! Here are some engaging dialogues that reflect your curiosity and enthusiasm:

1. **User:** "Mujhe nightlife ka taste samajhna hai, kya tum mujhe kuch recommend kar sakte ho?"
   **Bot:** "Bilkul! Keya ka vibe toh bahut hi amazing hai. Outdoor seating aur signature cocktails ka kya kehna! Tumhe kya pasand hai, dance ya chill karna?" 

2. **User:** "Kitty Su ke bare mein suna hai, kya ye sahi hai party ke liye?"
   **Bot:** "Haan, Kitty Su toh electronic dance music ke liye mashhoor hai! Tumhe kya genre of music pasand hai, shayad wahan tumhe wo sunne ko mile?" 

3. **User:** "Privee ka kya scene hai, suna hai wahan hip-hop chalta hai?"
   **Bot:** "Yes! Privee ka atmosphere toh vibrant hai, aur hip-hop nights ka maza alag hai! Tumhe kya lagta hai, weekend pe dance karna zyada exciting hai ya kuch aur?" 

4. **User:** "Story Club & Lounge kaisa hai, koi special experience?"
   **Bot:** "Story toh chic decor aur delicious cocktails ke liye jaana jaata hai! Tumhe kabhi mixology ka experience chakhna hai?" 

5. **User:** "SoHo Delhi mein crowd kaisa hota hai?"
   **Bot:** "SoHo ka crowd toh hamesha buzzing hota hai! Lekin thoda packed bhi ho sakta hai. Tumhe kya lagta hai, hustle and bustle zyada accha hai ya relaxed atmosphere?"

   **Bot:** "Diablo toh Wednesday nights ko super fun banata hai! Kya tum weekdays pe party karne ke liye ready ho?"

   **Bot:** "Haan, Dear Donna ka vibe romantic hai aur weekend pe dance bhi hota hai! Tumhe dinner date pe kya special chahiye?"

   **Bot:** "Monet mein ladies ke liye complimentary drinks hoti hain, toh ye ek accha option hai! Tumhe kya lagta hai, ladies night mein jaana kaisa hota hai?"

   **Bot:** "Summer House Cafe mein live gigs aur amazing DJs hote hain. Tumhe kis tarah ki music pasand hai, shayad yahan tumhe wo mile?"

    **Bot:** "YOUnion ka bar toh unique shots ke liye famous hai! Tumhe party mein experimentation pasand hai?"

    **Bot:** "Shalom ka Sufi night dance karne ke liye perfect hai! Kya tumhe Sufi music se connection feel hota hai?"

    **Bot:** "Bohca ka vibe toh hamesha lit hota hai! Kya tumhe late-night party karna pasand hai?"

    **Bot:** "Slique mein naam dikhane ka vibe toh unique hai! Kya tumhe aise special experiences se maza aata hai?"

    **Bot:** "Bergamo ka ambiance chill aur modern hai, perfect for after-parties! Tumhe kya lagta hai, ambiance ka influence party pe kitna hota hai?"

    **Bot:** "Toy Room ka nightlife toh champagne aur dancing se bhara hota hai! Kya tumhe aise lively atmospheres mein enjoy karna pasand hai?"

    **Bot:** "Haan, safety toh sabse pehle aata hai! Tumhe safety measures ke liye kya kya dhyan rakhna pasand hai?"

    **Bot:** "Bilkul! Har baar ek naya experience hota hai. Tumhe kya lagta hai, nayi jagah jaane se kya seekhne ko milta hai?"
