So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian  Google Rating: 4/5    Pro-Tip Looking to head to ladies' night? Check out our list of top 10 places! Now, let's get you dressed for it then. Ladies, get the perfect dresses and jumpsuits for your date night here. Men, check out these casual shirts that you can wear on your night out. .

---

**19. User:** "Dosto ke saath plan karne ka kya tareeka hai?"  
**Bot:** "Ek group chat bana lo aur sabse ideas lo! Aapka group kis tarah ki parties pasand karta hai?"  

---

**20. User:** "Kya nightlife safe hai Delhi mein?"  
**Bot:** "Haan, bas thoda dhyan rakhna padta hai. Kya aapko nightlife ke safety measures ke baare mein kuch aur jaanana hai?"  

---

-in output add short english leading thoughtful  questions at the end  relevent to 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away img-user-muskan-bansal-778750405967 By Muskan 451543  Interested | 489K   Views Be it weekdays or weekends, nightlife in Delhi never runs dry and folks in the city sure know how to have a good time. So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian  Google Rating: 4/5    Pro-Tip Looking to head to ladies' night? Check out our list of top 10 places! Now, let's get you dressed for it then. Ladies, get the perfect dresses and jumpsuits for your date night here.  - Sure! Here are 20 unique dialogues in a mentor-mentee style, focusing on the vibrant nightlife in Delhi.

1. **User:** Bhai, Delhi ki nightlife ka kya scene hai?  
   **Bot:** Oh, Delhi ki nightlife toh badi zabardast hai! Aapko Keya ya Kitty Su jaise clubs try karne chahiye. Kaunsa music genre aapko pasand hai?

2. **User:** Kahan jaana chahiye party ke liye?  
   **Bot:** Aap Privee ja sakte hain, wahan hip-hop music hota hai aur vibe badi mazedaar hoti hai. Aapko kis type ki crowd attract karti hai?

3. **User:** Kitty Su ke baare mein suna hai, kaisa hai?  
   **Bot:** Kitty Su toh ekdum vibrant hai, aur late-night parties ke liye famous hai. Kya aapko electronic dance music pasand hai?

4. **User:** Summer House Cafe kaisa hai?  
   **Bot:** Summer House Cafe mein live gigs aur amazing DJs hote hain. Aapko live music ka kya experience hai? 

5. **User:** Main toh weeknight party plan kar raha hoon.  
   **Bot:** Toh aap Diablo try kar sakte hain! Mid-week fun ka best spot hai. Aapko kis din party karne ka maza aata hai?

6. **User:** Mujhe cocktails chahiye, kaunse club kaunse best hain?  
   **Bot:** Keya aur Privee dono ke cocktails badiya hain. Aapko sweet ya strong cocktails pasand hain?

7. **User:** Bohca ka kya scene hai?  
   **Bot:** Bohca toh after-party ka king hai! Aapko entry ke liye guestlist par hona zaroori hai. Aapko kya pasand hai, chaos ya chill vibe?

8. **User:** Main toh sirf chill karna chahta hoon.  
   **Bot:** Toh aap Monet ya Summer House Cafe ja sakte hain, wahan relaxed atmosphere hota hai. Aapko kis type ka atmosphere pasand hai?

9. **User:** Shalom ka kya hai?  
   **Bot:** Shalom mein Sufi nights ka maza le sakte hain, badiya vibe hai. Kya aapko kuch alag experience chahiye tha?

10. **User:** Key ka vibe kaisa hai?  
    **Bot:** Key mein laser lights aur neon vibes hoti hain, perfect for dancing! Aapko kis tarah ki ambiance chahiye hoti hai?

11. **User:** Kahan best food milega party ke sath?  
    **Bot:** Story Club & Lounge ka food bhi amazing hai, aur music bhi. Kya aap dance karte waqt khana enjoy karna chahte hain?

12. **User:** Mujhe thodi fancy party chahiye.  
    **Bot:** Toh aap Bergamo ya Toy Room try kar sakte hain, dono mein sophisticated vibe hai. Kya aap fancy dress pehnna pasand karte hain?

13. **User:** Ladies night ka kya scene hai?  
    **Bot:** Privee aur Monet dono mein ladies night achha hota hai! Aapko ladies night ka experience kaisa lagta hai?

14. **User:** Mujhe outdoors vibe chahiye.  
    **Bot:** Toh aap Keya try kar sakte hain, outdoor seating hai wahan. Aapko open-air parties ka kya experience hai?

15. **User:** Kya mujhe solo jaana chahiye?  
    **Bot:** Solo jaane mein maza hai, aap nayi logon se mil sakte hain. Aapko solo outing ka experience kaisa lagta hai?

16. **User:** Main toh Bollywood music ki talash mein hoon!  
    **Bot:** Toh aap YOUnion ya Kitty Su ja sakte hain, wahan Bollywood hits hote hain. Aapko kis gaane par dance karna pasand hai?

17. **User:** Kya mujhe pre-booking karni padegi?  
    **Bot:** Haan, weekends par guestlist zaroori hoti hai. Aapne kabhi advance booking ki hai?

18. **User:** Kya wahan dress code hota hai?  
    **Bot:** Haan, kuch clubs mein dress code hota hai, toh achhe se tayaar ho kar jao. Aapka style kya hai, casual ya formal?

19. **User:** Kya mujhe friends ke sath jaana chahiye?  
    **Bot:** Friends ke sath jaana toh maza badha deta hai! Aapko kis tarah ki bonding pasand hai, party ya chill time?

20. **User:** Main weekend ki planning kar raha hoon.  
    **Bot:** Toh aapko pehle se sochna hoga ki kahan jaana hai. Aapne apne weekend plans ke liye kis club ka naam suna hai?

Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian  Google Rating: 4/5    Pro-Tip Looking to head to ladies' night? So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday. 2. **User:** Mujhe toh Kitty Su ka naam suna hai, lekin wahan ka crowd kaisa hota hai?  
   **Bot:** Kitty Su ka crowd kaafi vibrant hota hai, aur music bhi mast hota hai! Aap wahan dance aur chill kar sakte hain. Kya aap wahan jaane ki planning kar rahe hain? 

3. **User:** Mujhe cocktail peena hai, kaunsa club best hai?  
   **Bot:** Keya aur Privee dono ke cocktails famous hain! Keya ka atmosphere bhi bahut achha hai. Aapko kis type ke cocktails pasand hain, fruity ya strong? 

4. **User:** Privee mein kya special hai?  
   **Bot:** Privee mein hip-hop music aur massive dance floor hai, aur ladies ko drinks on the house milte hain Thursdays ko! Aapko kis type ki music pasand hai? 

5. **User:** Kya koi budget-friendly option hai?  
   **Bot:** Diablo aur Summer House Cafe kaafi affordable hain, aur wahan vibe bhi accha hota hai. Kya aap weekday party karne ka soch rahe hain? 

6. **User:** Sufi night ka kya scene hai?  
   **Bot:** Shalom par Sufi nights bohot popular hain, wahaan aap khoob groove kar sakte hain! Aapko Sufi music pasand hai ya aapko kuch aur chahiye? 

7. **User:** Agar mujhe rooftop vibe chahiye toh kahan jaaun?  
   **Bot:** Aap Monet ya Summer House Cafe try kar sakte hain, dono jagah outdoor seating hai. Aapko kis type ka cuisine pasand hai during a night out? 

8. **User:** Kya mujhe guest list pe hona zaroori hai?

9. **User:** Akele jaana thoda boring lagta hai.  
   **Bot:** Bilkul, doston ke saath jaana zyada mazaa hai! Aapne kabhi kisi club mein group outing plan kiya hai?

   **Bot:** Haan, bahut saare clubs ladies night offer karte hain, jaise Privee aur Monet, jahan ladies ko complimentary drinks milte hain. Kya aap apne dost ke saath jaana chahti hain?

   **Bot:** Privee aur Kitty Su ke dance floors kaafi lively hote hain! Aapko kis type ki dancing pasand hai?

Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian  Google Rating: 4/5    Pro-Tip Looking to head to ladies' night? So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over. So, if you are looking to unwind, let your hair loose, and dance the night away, we have got you covered. From exotic cocktails to the best of Bollywood and global playlists, here's a list of the best nightclubs in Delhi.  Overview   1.  Keya 2.  Kitty Su 3.  Privee 4.  Story Club and Lounge 5.  Key 6.  SoHo Delhi 7.  Diablo 8.  Dear Donna 9.  Monet 10.  Summer House Cafe 11.  YOUnion 12.  Shalom 13.  Bohca 14.  Slique 15.  Bergamo 16.  Toy Room 17.  Pro-Tip Here's A List 0f 16 Best Nightclubs In Delhi Keya Keya, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most popular nightclubs, Keya has been dominating the South Delhi scene for years. With outdoor seating and a classic indoor nightclub décor, it’s a great spot to visit if you’re in the Vasant Kunj area. Their cocktails are excellent, with the signature drinks being particularly popular. While it doesn’t stay open until the wee hours, we had to include it on the list for its intense nightclub vibe.  LBB Tip: You need to be on their guestlist to enter on a Saturday  Timings: 12:30 PM - 1 AM on all days  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian  Google Rating: 4/5  Kitty Su Kitty Su - The Lalit, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map One of Delhi’s most vibrant nightclubs, Kitty Su at The Lalit Hotel stays open late into the night. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian  Google Rating: 4/5    Pro-Tip Looking to head to ladies' night? Check out our list of top 10 places! Now, let's get you dressed for it then. Ladies, get the perfect dresses and jumpsuits for your date night here. Known for its intense electronic dance music gigs, this is the place to be if you’re looking to dance the night away. The nightclub features a Champagne lounge, an ‘A-list’ section, and a mini club within the club called The Salon. They even have a tattoo parlour!  Timings: 10 PM - 1 AM or later (depending on the crowd) from Tuesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisine: Italian   Google Rating: 4.1/5  Privee Privee - Shangri-La Eros New Delhi, New Delhi See On Map One of the few places that's packed even on Sundays, Privee is a hit among partygoers in town. They play a lot of hip-hop on Sundays and boast a massive space and dance floor. You can't leave this club without trying their cocktails! Thursdays are expat nights, and ladies get drinks on the house all night.  Timings: 11 PM - 5 AM from Wednesday to Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Chinese, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.7/5  Story Club and Lounge STORY Club & Lounge - The Westin, Sector 29, Gurgaon See On Map With elegant and chic decor, ace mixologists serving delicious cocktails, a carefully-curated food menu, and amazing music to let you dance the night away, Story definitely has us impressed. It’s also got a cigar lounge to boast of. Make a note—although it’s part of The Westin Hotel, entry to the place is separate.  Timings: 6 PM - 4 AM; closed on Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.  Price: INR 4,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Key Key - Hotel Samrat, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Decked out in red velvet sofas and curtains, with huge chandeliers, Key at Hotel Samrat is quite popular in Delhi's nightclub scene and still boasts a loyal list of regulars who swear by it. If laser beams, neon lights, spacious dance floors, and heady cocktails (definitely try the herbal bomb) are your thing, Key won’t leave you disappointed.  Timings: 10 PM - 4 AM (or later on some days) except for Mondays when it remains closed.  Price: INR 5,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 3.8/5  SoHo Delhi SOHO Delhi - The Ashok, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map SoHo has taken Delhi's nightclub scene by storm and continues to go from strength to strength (they even hosted Wiz Khalifa, people!). The bar area at this nightclub is massive, and the music literally never stops. A word of advice: the club gets really packed, so don’t expect much space for yourself.  Timings: 10 PM - 1:30 AM (or later on some days) on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Closed on Monday and Tuesday.  Price: INR 6,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Asian  Google Rating: 3.5/5  Diablo Diablo, Mehrauli, New Delhi See On Map We don't know about you, but every Wednesday night, our Instagram feed is full of videos of people partying at Diablo, and we can't deny that it looks super fun, especially if you're the party type. So, hit this place up for some mid-week fun, and it won't disappoint.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Italian, Turkish, Iranian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Dear Donna Dear Donna - Qutub Hotel, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map If you're from Delhi, then this place probably needs no introduction. You can head here for dinner dates—they serve Asian, European, and Italian food on weekdays, and on weekends you can expect a night full of dancing and partying as the space turns into something similar to a nightclub.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Thai, Italian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Monet Monet, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map Monet is a nightclub in  Delhi that opened in Ansal Plaza not long ago but has proved to be an incredible party place. They've got complimentary drinks for ladies every Wednesday night and have even opened another outlet in Gurugram.  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Mediterranean, Oriental, Asian, Chinese  Google Rating: 3.9/5  Summer House Cafe Summer House Cafe, Hauz Khas, New Delhi See On Map You’ll find some amazing DJs performing at Summer House Cafe, and if not, there’s usually a live gig or two. The food is great, the cocktails are excellent, and it’s the perfect place to spend your Saturday night with good company. And don’t forget, it’s happy hour from 12 noon to 9 PM!  Timings: 12 noon - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: North Indian, Continental, Chinese  Google Rating: 4.2/5  YOUnion Younion, Qutab Institutional Area, New Delhi See On Map For a walk on the wild side (as their neon sign says), head to this nightclub in Delhi. They have a high-energy bar with 300 unique shots for those days when you really want to rage (we didn’t even know that many were possible). You’ll also find a menu full of comfort food options, best enjoyed in their al fresco seating and relaxed ambiance.  Timings: 12 PM - 2 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 for two with alcohol  Cuisines: Chinese, European, Continental, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Shalom Shalom - Laidback Cafe, New Delhi See On Map Love Sufi nights? Then Shalom on Wednesdays is the place for you. It's jam-packed, but definitely a night you won't stop grooving to hit Sufi songs.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,200 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Oriental, Continental, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.2/5  Bohca Bohca - Qutub Residency Hotel, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map You were wrong if you thought we wouldn't add Bohca to a party list. When you ask a friend where to go for the after-party, chances are they'll say 'Bohca chalte hai' so you know this place is lit. Head here to dance till your feet hurt. Like  most nightclubs in Delhi, you need your names on their guestlist to party here on a weekend.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM (5 AM on some days), all days of the week.  Price: INR 2,500 without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Italian, Middle Eastern, North Indian  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Slique Slique, Andrews Ganj, New Delhi See On Map This is where you can get your name displayed on the LED screen! Just letting you know; in case you were wondering. This nightclub in Delhi has been around for a while (it was previously called 'Clique') and was quite the rage back in the day. We recommend going here on a Saturday night.  Timings: 12 PM - 1 AM, all days of the week.  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Asian, Continental  Google Rating: 3.3/5  Bergamo Bergamo - The Grand New Delhi, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi See On Map Bergamo has become a go-to nightclub in Delhi for Gen Z lately, and it totally lives up to the hype. It’s usually an after-party spot for Delhiites, as it stays open pretty late on Saturdays. The vibe is super chill, with a beautiful, modern ambiance and a great selection of food and drinks. Their bar console is pretty impressive too, and we love the sign in their washrooms: "Don’t Text Your Ex," a universal reminder that everyone needs to hear.  Timings: 12 PM - 4 AM on weekends  Price: INR 3,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Italian, Continental  Google Rating: 4.1/5  Toy Room Toy Room - Aloft Hotel, IGI Airport, New Delhi See On Map Toy Room has nightclubs across the globe, including one at the Aloft Hotel in Aerocity. This nightclub in Delhi NCR offers the most typical nightclub vibes, with champagne showdowns and people dancing their hearts out until the club shuts down. Their mascot, Frank, a life-sized teddy bear, can often be seen goofing around and taking pictures with guests. They do charge hefty cover charges, so make a note of that before heading over.  Timings: 12 AM - 6 AM on weekends  Price: INR 5,000 for two without alcohol  Cuisines: Continental, Italian and Asian  Google Rating: 4/5    Pro-Tip Looking to head to ladies' night? -in output add short english leading thoughtful  questions at the end  relevent to They do call breakfast the most important meal of the day so we thought we’d find places around town doing some delectable brekkie, so we can start our day off right, feeling light and bright. Here are 16 awesome places you can go to for devouring a hearty, morning meal.   Overview   1.  Camillo's 2.  Fig At Museo 3.  Saravana Bhavan 4.  AMA Cafe 5.  Andhra Bhavan 6.  Cafe Lota 7.  Jain Chawal Wale 8.  Di Ghent Cafe 9.  For Earth's Sake 10.  Cafe Tesu 11.  Juggernaut 12.  Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba 13.  Getafix 14.  Amour Bistro 15.  Sita Ram Diwan Chand 16.  Moolchand Paratha 17. Milkind Cafe Camillo's Camillo's - The Manor Hotel, New Friends Colony, New Delhi See On Map Camillo's is one of our favourite pizza places in the capital, and now, luckily for us, they've launched a breakfast menu (served from 8 AM to 11 AM) that focuses on wholesome, uncomplicated breakfast delights. Our favourite from the (short and sweet) menu is their Creamy Chicken Sandwich, which checks all of the boxes for the ultimate comfort sandwich —with soft milk bread toasted to perfection, and a delectable chicken stuffing made with thousand island, dehydrated pineapple, and peppers.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.5/5  Fig At Museo Fig At Museo, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map Even on the hottest of days, you can rely on this cafe for a cool outdoor breakfast experience. Their breakfast menu includes a variety of eggs, open toast, pancakes and smoothie bowls. The outdoor area has many trees which help shade the area very well and there's a cool water mist in the summertime too. They also have an indoor seating area, if that's what you prefer. The cafe is placed inside Camera Museum which opens at 11 am, so after breakfast, you can visit the museum and learn about the history of photography!  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,400 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Saravana Bhavan Saravana Bhavan, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map Saravana Bhavan is our all-time favourite when it comes to South Indian grub and for good reason—their food is absolutely delish. They’ve got dosa, idli, vada pav, uttapam, and all the southy food that makes breakfast a delight.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  AMA Cafe AMA Cafe, Majnu Ka Tila, New Delhi See On Map This Majnu Ka Tila joint offers a brekkie menu full of power-packed dishes. You can choose between a Himalayan Breakfast, an English one, or an American version. They’ve also got pancakes, cereal, eggs, and salads.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Andhra Bhavan Andhra Bhavan, New Delhi See On Map If you’re the kind of person who gets more confused the more options they see on the menu, you’re gonna love what these guys have in store for you. Andhra Bhavan’s breakfast section has an idli, a vada, and a dosa of your choice paired with tea or coffee. Go, say “breakfast,” done.  Opening Time: 11:30 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Cafe Lota Cafe Lota, Pragati Maidan, New Delhi See On Map If you haven’t been living under a rock, you probably know how amazing the food at Cafe Lota is (it’s a fan favourite for a reason). For brekkie options, you’ve got ragi vada pav, idli, and different paratha variants. If that’s not your jam (breakfast pun?), they’ve also got pancakes, sandwiches, egg bhurji and a distinctive quinoa upma we can’t wait to try.  Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Jain Chawal Wale Jain Chawal Wale, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map You’ll almost always find a big crowd in front of this place partly because it’s in CP and partly because the vegetarian food here is some of the best you’ll find around town. Their breakfast options include chhole bhature, parathas, bread and paneer pakoras, and their special lassi and chaach.  Opening Time: 7 AM  Price For Two: INR 450 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Di Ghent Cafe Di Ghent Cafe, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map With a menu full of delicious food, this place is doing the first meal of the day all kinds of justice. They’ve got pancakes, crepes, bagels, toast, eggs, sandwiches, and a lot more. If that massive menu doesn’t spell breakfast, we don’t know what does.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  For Earth's Sake For Earth's Sake, DLF Phase - 5, Gurgaon See On Map This zero-waste cafe and store with two outlets in Gurgaon - Galleria and Southpoint Mall. While they don’t have a particular breakfast menu, they have breakfast foods such as sandwiches, bagels, open toast and vegetarian omelettes (made from besan and no, they don’t taste like cheelas).   Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 900 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/5  Cafe Tesu Cafe Tesu, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map This Adchini cafe has had our hearts for quite a while now. Their amazing tea blends and coffee concoctions are the perfect kickstarter to the morning, while the fruit bowls, waffles, eggs (so many variants), and Indian breakfast options will keep you going through the day (well, at least till lunch).  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,100 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Juggernaut Juggernaut, Kailash Colony, New Delhi See On Map With good ol’ dosa, idli, vada pav, and uttapam, the cute, little cafe in Kailash Colony is doing brekkie right. You’ll also find muesli, sprouts, yogurt, sandwiches and more if you’re looking for a healthy alternative. How about a fresh fruit platter to finish it up?  Opening Time: 6 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba, Sonipat See On Map Amrik Sukhdev is almost a landmark that has had a steady stream of patrons visiting it for years now. This dhaba offers both indoor and outdoor seating and the service is super quick. Try their famous paranthas and don't forget to end your meal with chai.  Open: 24 Hours   Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/5  Getafix Getafix Cafe, Greater Kailash - 1, New Delhi See On Map Getafix is a quaint café known for using fresh ingredients to make healthy, nutritious, and yummy food. Their smoothies and sandwiches, in particular, are amazing. You'll definitely find a range of continental breakfast options here.  Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,900 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Amour Bistro Amour Bistro, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Amour Bistro has comfortable seating, beautiful decor, and great food. It has an eclectic breakfast menu offering sandwiches, waffles, pancakes, quiches and more - available from 8 am to 11:30 am.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 2,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Sita Ram Diwan Chand Sita Ram Diwan Chand, Paharganj, New Delhi See On Map Chhole Bhature hold a special place in the hearts of Delhiites and apparently people can have it for all meals. Sita Ram Diwan Chand is still arguably one of the best places for the same. Apart from that they also have Paneer Bhatura, Meethi Lassi, Chana Kulcha and Kulfi.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 300 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.6/5  Moolchand Paratha Moolchand Parantha, Lajpat Nagar - 4, New Delhi See On Map Parathas are a staple of an authentic Delhi breakfast. Moolchand Paratha serves a variety of paranthas, from the classic egg and paneer parantha to chilli garlic and egg keema parantha.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/6  Eleved Eleved, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Eleved is a totally different experience. They are the world's first elevated lifestyle brand inspired by Vedic wisdom and offer a unique and healthy breakfast menu that is Ayurveda-centric. The ambience is also super calming and soothing, with rattan and wooden textures enveloping you in a warm embrace. Their USP is the use of local and regional produce, giving them an international flair and profile. They also have a concept store and a yoga meditation centre called Life Yoga. The concept store offers clean and organic lifestyle products. From Andhra Green Gram Pesarattu Dosa to flavourful hummus bowls, this place is a must-visit for anyone looking for healthy-tasty and Ayurvedic meals. We recommend you start the perfect day by attending a yoga session and then indulging in a healthy breakfast here.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Caara At Malcha Marg Caara At Ogaan, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Caara has made a niche in Delhi, especially in the breakfast scene and for good reason. All of their menu items are as healthy as they are delicious, prepared using homegrown ingredients and supreme culinary techniques. Their Corn and kale Fritters with Poached Eggs, French Brie and tomato Tart, and CAARA Farmlove Salad are must-tries. You can also try their new location in Khan Market, etched with the Pure Home & Living store.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 2,700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.1/5  Blanca Blanca, Chhattarpur, New Delhi See On Map A new addition to the very popular Dhan Mill Compound, Blanca is the perfect morning coffee spot with some super light and fresh light delights. The ambience is super cosy and colourful but not over the top. The real star is their menu, which has a long list of incredible food options like Hash Brown Benedict, Blanca Grilled Salmon, Hot Honey Chicken Waffle, Lotus Biscoff latte, and Macha Fomo.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Roastery Roastery Coffee House, Dwarka, New Delhi See On Map If you are in Dwarka or looking for a super cosy place to eat breakfast in Dwarka, we say head to Roastery! Located right on the main road, it is a beautiful cafe serving delicious coffee, bites, and desserts with the most aesthetic-looking ambience. You'll be greeted by tall ceilings, tan rustic walls, and food that is fresh and full of flavour. They also have a location in Noida, which is a lovely experience during the winter.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Rating: 4.5/5  Daisy Mae Garden Cafe Daisy Mae Garden Cafe, Khan Market, New Delhi See On Map With absolutely breathtaking tropical floral interiors and dishes inspired by them, Daisy Mae in Khan Market is another of our go-to's for a healthy and refreshing breakfast. Their outdoor seating is absolutely gorgeous, with a view and background decor. We highly recommend trying out their fresh and light smoothie bowls. It's the perfect brunch place to catch up with your girlfriends.  Opening Time: 12 PM  Price For Two: INR 1,100 (approx.)  Zomato Rating: 3.4/5  Cactus Lily Cactus Lily, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map The new kid on the block that has recently expanded its space is Cactus Lily. It is a cosy little place in the Galleria Market of Gurgaon, always brimming with folks trying to land their sandwiches. Apart from sandwiches you should give. their hearty side of fries a try as well.  Opening Time: 11 AM  Price For Two: INR 600 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.8/5  Pro-Tip: Check out our review of Cactus Lily here. The place is a true advocate for inclusivity, which is well reflected in its decor and menu. This place also doubles up as a great place to work from.
