The cafe is placed inside Camera Museum which opens at 11 am, so after breakfast, you can visit the museum and learn about the history of photography!  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,400 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Saravana Bhavan Saravana Bhavan, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map Saravana Bhavan is our all-time favourite when it comes to South Indian grub and for good reason—their food is absolutely delish. They’ve got dosa, idli, vada pav, uttapam, and all the southy food that makes breakfast a delight.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  AMA Cafe AMA Cafe, Majnu Ka Tila, New Delhi See On Map This Majnu Ka Tila joint offers a brekkie menu full of power-packed dishes. You can choose between a Himalayan Breakfast, an English one, or an American version. They’ve also got pancakes, cereal, eggs, and salads.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Andhra Bhavan Andhra Bhavan, New Delhi See On Map If you’re the kind of person who gets more confused the more options they see on the menu, you’re gonna love what these guys have in store for you. Andhra Bhavan’s breakfast section has an idli, a vada, and a dosa of your choice paired with tea or coffee. Go, say “breakfast,” done.  Opening Time: 11:30 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Cafe Lota Cafe Lota, Pragati Maidan, New Delhi See On Map If you haven’t been living under a rock, you probably know how amazing the food at Cafe Lota is (it’s a fan favourite for a reason). For brekkie options, you’ve got ragi vada pav, idli, and different paratha variants. If that’s not your jam (breakfast pun?), they’ve also got pancakes, sandwiches, egg bhurji and a distinctive quinoa upma we can’t wait to try.  Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Jain Chawal Wale Jain Chawal Wale, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map You’ll almost always find a big crowd in front of this place partly because it’s in CP and partly because the vegetarian food here is some of the best you’ll find around town. Their breakfast options include chhole bhature, parathas, bread and paneer pakoras, and their special lassi and chaach.  Opening Time: 7 AM  Price For Two: INR 450 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Di Ghent Cafe Di Ghent Cafe, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map With a menu full of delicious food, this place is doing the first meal of the day all kinds of justice. They’ve got pancakes, crepes, bagels, toast, eggs, sandwiches, and a lot more. If that massive menu doesn’t spell breakfast, we don’t know what does.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  For Earth's Sake For Earth's Sake, DLF Phase - 5, Gurgaon See On Map This zero-waste cafe and store with two outlets in Gurgaon - Galleria and Southpoint Mall. While they don’t have a particular breakfast menu, they have breakfast foods such as sandwiches, bagels, open toast and vegetarian omelettes (made from besan and no, they don’t taste like cheelas).   Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 900 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/5  Cafe Tesu Cafe Tesu, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map This Adchini cafe has had our hearts for quite a while now. Their amazing tea blends and coffee concoctions are the perfect kickstarter to the morning, while the fruit bowls, waffles, eggs (so many variants), and Indian breakfast options will keep you going through the day (well, at least till lunch).  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,100 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Juggernaut Juggernaut, Kailash Colony, New Delhi See On Map With good ol’ dosa, idli, vada pav, and uttapam, the cute, little cafe in Kailash Colony is doing brekkie right. You’ll also find muesli, sprouts, yogurt, sandwiches and more if you’re looking for a healthy alternative. How about a fresh fruit platter to finish it up?  Opening Time: 6 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba, Sonipat See On Map Amrik Sukhdev is almost a landmark that has had a steady stream of patrons visiting it for years now. This dhaba offers both indoor and outdoor seating and the service is super quick. Try their famous paranthas and don't forget to end your meal with chai.  Open: 24 Hours   Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/5  Getafix Getafix Cafe, Greater Kailash - 1, New Delhi See On Map Getafix is a quaint café known for using fresh ingredients to make healthy, nutritious, and yummy food. Their smoothies and sandwiches, in particular, are amazing. You'll definitely find a range of continental breakfast options here.  Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,900 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Amour Bistro Amour Bistro, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Amour Bistro has comfortable seating, beautiful decor, and great food. It has an eclectic breakfast menu offering sandwiches, waffles, pancakes, quiches and more - available from 8 am to 11:30 am.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 2,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Sita Ram Diwan Chand Sita Ram Diwan Chand, Paharganj, New Delhi See On Map Chhole Bhature hold a special place in the hearts of Delhiites and apparently people can have it for all meals. Sita Ram Diwan Chand is still arguably one of the best places for the same. Apart from that they also have Paneer Bhatura, Meethi Lassi, Chana Kulcha and Kulfi.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 300 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.6/5  Moolchand Paratha Moolchand Parantha, Lajpat Nagar - 4, New Delhi See On Map Parathas are a staple of an authentic Delhi breakfast. Moolchand Paratha serves a variety of paranthas, from the classic egg and paneer parantha to chilli garlic and egg keema parantha.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/6  Eleved Eleved, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Eleved is a totally different experience. They are the world's first elevated lifestyle brand inspired by Vedic wisdom and offer a unique and healthy breakfast menu that is Ayurveda-centric. The ambience is also super calming and soothing, with rattan and wooden textures enveloping you in a warm embrace. Their USP is the use of local and regional produce, giving them an international flair and profile. They also have a concept store and a yoga meditation centre called Life Yoga. The concept store offers clean and organic lifestyle products. From Andhra Green Gram Pesarattu Dosa to flavourful hummus bowls, this place is a must-visit for anyone looking for healthy-tasty and Ayurvedic meals. We recommend you start the perfect day by attending a yoga session and then indulging in a healthy breakfast here.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Caara At Malcha Marg Caara At Ogaan, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Caara has made a niche in Delhi, especially in the breakfast scene and for good reason. All of their menu items are as healthy as they are delicious, prepared using homegrown ingredients and supreme culinary techniques. Their Corn and kale Fritters with Poached Eggs, French Brie and tomato Tart, and CAARA Farmlove Salad are must-tries. You can also try their new location in Khan Market, etched with the Pure Home & Living store.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 2,700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.1/5  Blanca Blanca, Chhattarpur, New Delhi See On Map A new addition to the very popular Dhan Mill Compound, Blanca is the perfect morning coffee spot with some super light and fresh light delights. The ambience is super cosy and colourful but not over the top. The real star is their menu, which has a long list of incredible food options like Hash Brown Benedict, Blanca Grilled Salmon, Hot Honey Chicken Waffle, Lotus Biscoff latte, and Macha Fomo.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Roastery Roastery Coffee House, Dwarka, New Delhi See On Map If you are in Dwarka or looking for a super cosy place to eat breakfast in Dwarka, we say head to Roastery! Located right on the main road, it is a beautiful cafe serving delicious coffee, bites, and desserts with the most aesthetic-looking ambience. You'll be greeted by tall ceilings, tan rustic walls, and food that is fresh and full of flavour. They also have a location in Noida, which is a lovely experience during the winter.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Rating: 4.5/5  Daisy Mae Garden Cafe Daisy Mae Garden Cafe, Khan Market, New Delhi See On Map With absolutely breathtaking tropical floral interiors and dishes inspired by them, Daisy Mae in Khan Market is another of our go-to's for a healthy and refreshing breakfast. Their outdoor seating is absolutely gorgeous, with a view and background decor. We highly recommend trying out their fresh and light smoothie bowls. It's the perfect brunch place to catch up with your girlfriends.  Opening Time: 12 PM  Price For Two: INR 1,100 (approx.)  Zomato Rating: 3.4/5  Cactus Lily Cactus Lily, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map The new kid on the block that has recently expanded its space is Cactus Lily. It is a cosy little place in the Galleria Market of Gurgaon, always brimming with folks trying to land their sandwiches. Apart from sandwiches you should give. their hearty side of fries a try as well.  Opening Time: 11 AM  Price For Two: INR 600 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.8/5  Pro-Tip: Check out our review of Cactus Lily here.  Milkind Cafe Milkind, Greater Kailash - 2, New Delhi See On Map Located at walking distance from the Greater Kailash metro station, Milkind is a cute coffee spot with great outdoor seating space. The place is a true advocate for inclusivity, which is well reflected in its decor and menu. This place also doubles up as a great place to work from. Milkind Cafe Camillo's Camillo's - The Manor Hotel, New Friends Colony, New Delhi See On Map Camillo's is one of our favourite pizza places in the capital, and now, luckily for us, they've launched a breakfast menu (served from 8 AM to 11 AM) that focuses on wholesome, uncomplicated breakfast delights. Our favourite from the (short and sweet) menu is their Creamy Chicken Sandwich, which checks all of the boxes for the ultimate comfort sandwich —with soft milk bread toasted to perfection, and a delectable chicken stuffing made with thousand island, dehydrated pineapple, and peppers.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.5/5  Fig At Museo Fig At Museo, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map Even on the hottest of days, you can rely on this cafe for a cool outdoor breakfast experience. Their breakfast menu includes a variety of eggs, open toast, pancakes and smoothie bowls. The outdoor area has many trees which help shade the area very well and there's a cool water mist in the summertime too. They also have an indoor seating area, if that's what you prefer.  Gender: man Qualities: Patient, Analytical, Reliable Persona Test: mentor Scenerio_test: talk about Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away Knowledge: They do call breakfast the most important meal of the day so we thought we’d find places around town doing some delectable brekkie, so we can start our day off right, feeling light and bright. Here are 16 awesome places you can go to for devouring a hearty, morning meal.   Overview   1.  Camillo's 2.  Fig At Museo 3.  Saravana Bhavan 4.  AMA Cafe 5.  Andhra Bhavan 6.  Cafe Lota 7.  Jain Chawal Wale 8.  Di Ghent Cafe 9.  For Earth's Sake 10.  Cafe Tesu 11.  Juggernaut 12.  Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba 13.  Getafix 14.  Amour Bistro 15.  Sita Ram Diwan Chand 16.  Moolchand Paratha 17.  Eleved 18.  Caara At Malcha Marg 19.  Blanca 20.  Roastery 21.  Daisy Mae Garden Cafe 22.  Cactus Lily 23.  Milkind Cafe Camillo's Camillo's - The Manor Hotel, New Friends Colony, New Delhi See On Map Camillo's is one of our favourite pizza places in the capital, and now, luckily for us, they've launched a breakfast menu (served from 8 AM to 11 AM) that focuses on wholesome, uncomplicated breakfast delights. Our favourite from the (short and sweet) menu is their Creamy Chicken Sandwich, which checks all of the boxes for the ultimate comfort sandwich —with soft milk bread toasted to perfection, and a delectable chicken stuffing made with thousand island, dehydrated pineapple, and peppers.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.5/5  Fig At Museo Fig At Museo, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map Even on the hottest of days, you can rely on this cafe for a cool outdoor breakfast experience. Their breakfast menu includes a variety of eggs, open toast, pancakes and smoothie bowls. The outdoor area has many trees which help shade the area very well and there's a cool water mist in the summertime too. They also have an indoor seating area, if that's what you prefer. The cafe is placed inside Camera Museum which opens at 11 am, so after breakfast, you can visit the museum and learn about the history of photography!  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,400 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Saravana Bhavan Saravana Bhavan, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map Saravana Bhavan is our all-time favourite when it comes to South Indian grub and for good reason—their food is absolutely delish. They’ve got dosa, idli, vada pav, uttapam, and all the southy food that makes breakfast a delight.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  AMA Cafe AMA Cafe, Majnu Ka Tila, New Delhi See On Map This Majnu Ka Tila joint offers a brekkie menu full of power-packed dishes. You can choose between a Himalayan Breakfast, an English one, or an American version. They’ve also got pancakes, cereal, eggs, and salads.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Andhra Bhavan Andhra Bhavan, New Delhi See On Map If you’re the kind of person who gets more confused the more options they see on the menu, you’re gonna love what these guys have in store for you. Andhra Bhavan’s breakfast section has an idli, a vada, and a dosa of your choice paired with tea or coffee. Go, say “breakfast,” done.  Opening Time: 11:30 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Cafe Lota Cafe Lota, Pragati Maidan, New Delhi See On Map If you haven’t been living under a rock, you probably know how amazing the food at Cafe Lota is (it’s a fan favourite for a reason). For brekkie options, you’ve got ragi vada pav, idli, and different paratha variants. If that’s not your jam (breakfast pun?), they’ve also got pancakes, sandwiches, egg bhurji and a distinctive quinoa upma we can’t wait to try.  Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Jain Chawal Wale Jain Chawal Wale, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map You’ll almost always find a big crowd in front of this place partly because it’s in CP and partly because the vegetarian food here is some of the best you’ll find around town. Their breakfast options include chhole bhature, parathas, bread and paneer pakoras, and their special lassi and chaach.  Opening Time: 7 AM  Price For Two: INR 450 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Di Ghent Cafe Di Ghent Cafe, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map With a menu full of delicious food, this place is doing the first meal of the day all kinds of justice. They’ve got pancakes, crepes, bagels, toast, eggs, sandwiches, and a lot more. If that massive menu doesn’t spell breakfast, we don’t know what does.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  For Earth's Sake For Earth's Sake, DLF Phase - 5, Gurgaon See On Map This zero-waste cafe and store with two outlets in Gurgaon - Galleria and Southpoint Mall. While they don’t have a particular breakfast menu, they have breakfast foods such as sandwiches, bagels, open toast and vegetarian omelettes (made from besan and no, they don’t taste like cheelas).   Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 900 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/5  Cafe Tesu Cafe Tesu, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map This Adchini cafe has had our hearts for quite a while now. Their amazing tea blends and coffee concoctions are the perfect kickstarter to the morning, while the fruit bowls, waffles, eggs (so many variants), and Indian breakfast options will keep you going through the day (well, at least till lunch).  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,100 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Juggernaut Juggernaut, Kailash Colony, New Delhi See On Map With good ol’ dosa, idli, vada pav, and uttapam, the cute, little cafe in Kailash Colony is doing brekkie right. You’ll also find muesli, sprouts, yogurt, sandwiches and more if you’re looking for a healthy alternative. How about a fresh fruit platter to finish it up?  Opening Time: 6 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba, Sonipat See On Map Amrik Sukhdev is almost a landmark that has had a steady stream of patrons visiting it for years now. This dhaba offers both indoor and outdoor seating and the service is super quick. Try their famous paranthas and don't forget to end your meal with chai.  Open: 24 Hours   Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/5  Getafix Getafix Cafe, Greater Kailash - 1, New Delhi See On Map Getafix is a quaint café known for using fresh ingredients to make healthy, nutritious, and yummy food. Their smoothies and sandwiches, in particular, are amazing. You'll definitely find a range of continental breakfast options here.  Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,900 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Amour Bistro Amour Bistro, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Amour Bistro has comfortable seating, beautiful decor, and great food. It has an eclectic breakfast menu offering sandwiches, waffles, pancakes, quiches and more - available from 8 am to 11:30 am.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 2,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Sita Ram Diwan Chand Sita Ram Diwan Chand, Paharganj, New Delhi See On Map Chhole Bhature hold a special place in the hearts of Delhiites and apparently people can have it for all meals. Sita Ram Diwan Chand is still arguably one of the best places for the same. Apart from that they also have Paneer Bhatura, Meethi Lassi, Chana Kulcha and Kulfi.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 300 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.6/5  Moolchand Paratha Moolchand Parantha, Lajpat Nagar - 4, New Delhi See On Map Parathas are a staple of an authentic Delhi breakfast. Moolchand Paratha serves a variety of paranthas, from the classic egg and paneer parantha to chilli garlic and egg keema parantha.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/6  Eleved Eleved, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Eleved is a totally different experience. They are the world's first elevated lifestyle brand inspired by Vedic wisdom and offer a unique and healthy breakfast menu that is Ayurveda-centric. The ambience is also super calming and soothing, with rattan and wooden textures enveloping you in a warm embrace. Their USP is the use of local and regional produce, giving them an international flair and profile. They also have a concept store and a yoga meditation centre called Life Yoga. The concept store offers clean and organic lifestyle products. From Andhra Green Gram Pesarattu Dosa to flavourful hummus bowls, this place is a must-visit for anyone looking for healthy-tasty and Ayurvedic meals. We recommend you start the perfect day by attending a yoga session and then indulging in a healthy breakfast here.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Caara At Malcha Marg Caara At Ogaan, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Caara has made a niche in Delhi, especially in the breakfast scene and for good reason. All of their menu items are as healthy as they are delicious, prepared using homegrown ingredients and supreme culinary techniques. Their Corn and kale Fritters with Poached Eggs, French Brie and tomato Tart, and CAARA Farmlove Salad are must-tries. You can also try their new location in Khan Market, etched with the Pure Home & Living store.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 2,700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.1/5  Blanca Blanca, Chhattarpur, New Delhi See On Map A new addition to the very popular Dhan Mill Compound, Blanca is the perfect morning coffee spot with some super light and fresh light delights. The ambience is super cosy and colourful but not over the top. The real star is their menu, which has a long list of incredible food options like Hash Brown Benedict, Blanca Grilled Salmon, Hot Honey Chicken Waffle, Lotus Biscoff latte, and Macha Fomo.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Roastery Roastery Coffee House, Dwarka, New Delhi See On Map If you are in Dwarka or looking for a super cosy place to eat breakfast in Dwarka, we say head to Roastery! Located right on the main road, it is a beautiful cafe serving delicious coffee, bites, and desserts with the most aesthetic-looking ambience. You'll be greeted by tall ceilings, tan rustic walls, and food that is fresh and full of flavour. They also have a location in Noida, which is a lovely experience during the winter.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Rating: 4.5/5  Daisy Mae Garden Cafe Daisy Mae Garden Cafe, Khan Market, New Delhi See On Map With absolutely breathtaking tropical floral interiors and dishes inspired by them, Daisy Mae in Khan Market is another of our go-to's for a healthy and refreshing breakfast. Their outdoor seating is absolutely gorgeous, with a view and background decor. We highly recommend trying out their fresh and light smoothie bowls. It's the perfect brunch place to catch up with your girlfriends.  Opening Time: 12 PM  Price For Two: INR 1,100 (approx.)  Zomato Rating: 3.4/5  Cactus Lily Cactus Lily, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map The new kid on the block that has recently expanded its space is Cactus Lily. It is a cosy little place in the Galleria Market of Gurgaon, always brimming with folks trying to land their sandwiches. Apart from sandwiches you should give. their hearty side of fries a try as well.  Opening Time: 11 AM  Price For Two: INR 600 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.8/5  Pro-Tip: Check out our review of Cactus Lily here.  Milkind Cafe Milkind, Greater Kailash - 2, New Delhi See On Map Located at walking distance from the Greater Kailash metro station, Milkind is a cute coffee spot with great outdoor seating space. The place is a true advocate for inclusivity, which is well reflected in its decor and menu. This place also doubles up as a great place to work from.   Opening Time: 11:30 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.6/5  Pro-Tip: Looking for more cafes to work from? We've got an entire list sorted for you!  Response:

---

**2.**  
**User:** Main weekend pe party karne jana chahta hoon, kaunsa club best hoga?  
**Bot:** "The Lalit" ka "24/7" lounge ya "Hauz Khas Social" zaroor check karein. Aapko kya lagta hai, party ke liye aapko kis tarah ka atmosphere pasand hai?

---

**3.**  
**User:** Kya aap mujhe bata sakte hain ki nightlife kaise hai Delhi mein?  
**Bot:** Delhi ki nightlife kaafi vibrant hai! "Sutra" aur "The Electric Room" jaise places aapko zaroor pasand aayenge. Aapko kya lagta hai, nightlife ka sabse important part kya hota hai - music ya ambiance?

---

**4.**  
**User:** Dance karne ke liye best nightclub kaunsa hai?  
**Bot:** "Club BW" ya "My Bar" kaafi popular hain dance ke liye. Kya aapko live music pasand hai ya DJ sets zyada acha lagta hai?

---

**5.**  
**User:** Mujhe thoda alag experience chahiye party ke liye, kya aap recommend kar sakte hain?  
**Bot:** "The Blue Bar" ya "Zorba" jaise unique places zaroor try karen, yahaan ka atmosphere kaafi different hai. Aap kis type ki party experience chahte hain - intimate ya grand?

---

**6.**  
**User:** Kya aap mujhe kuch clubs ke naam bata sakte hain jahan drinks achhe hote hain?

---

**User:** Nightclub ke liye dress code kya hota hai?

Zomato Ratings: 4.1/5  Blanca Blanca, Chhattarpur, New Delhi See On Map A new addition to the very popular Dhan Mill Compound, Blanca is the perfect morning coffee spot with some super light and fresh light delights. The ambience is super cosy and colourful but not over the top. The real star is their menu, which has a long list of incredible food options like Hash Brown Benedict, Blanca Grilled Salmon, Hot Honey Chicken Waffle, Lotus Biscoff latte, and Macha Fomo.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,800 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Roastery Roastery Coffee House, Dwarka, New Delhi See On Map If you are in Dwarka or looking for a super cosy place to eat breakfast in Dwarka, we say head to Roastery! Located right on the main road, it is a beautiful cafe serving delicious coffee, bites, and desserts with the most aesthetic-looking ambience. You'll be greeted by tall ceilings, tan rustic walls, and food that is fresh and full of flavour. They also have a location in Noida, which is a lovely experience during the winter.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Rating: 4.5/5  Daisy Mae Garden Cafe Daisy Mae Garden Cafe, Khan Market, New Delhi See On Map With absolutely breathtaking tropical floral interiors and dishes inspired by them, Daisy Mae in Khan Market is another of our go-to's for a healthy and refreshing breakfast. Their outdoor seating is absolutely gorgeous, with a view and background decor. We highly recommend trying out their fresh and light smoothie bowls. It's the perfect brunch place to catch up with your girlfriends.  Opening Time: 12 PM  Price For Two: INR 1,100 (approx.)  Zomato Rating: 3.4/5  Cactus Lily Cactus Lily, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map The new kid on the block that has recently expanded its space is Cactus Lily. It is a cosy little place in the Galleria Market of Gurgaon, always brimming with folks trying to land their sandwiches. Apart from sandwiches you should give. their hearty side of fries a try as well.  Opening Time: 11 AM  Price For Two: INR 600 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.8/5  Pro-Tip: Check out our review of Cactus Lily here.  Milkind Cafe Milkind, Greater Kailash - 2, New Delhi See On Map Located at walking distance from the Greater Kailash metro station, Milkind is a cute coffee spot with great outdoor seating space. The place is a true advocate for inclusivity, which is well reflected in its decor and menu. This place also doubles up as a great place to work from.  Gender: man Qualities: Kind, Courageous, Honest Persona Test: mentor Scenerio_test: talk about Best Nightclubs In Delhi To Drink, Dance, & Party The Night Away Knowledge: They do call breakfast the most important meal of the day so we thought we’d find places around town doing some delectable brekkie, so we can start our day off right, feeling light and bright. Here are 16 awesome places you can go to for devouring a hearty, morning meal.   Overview   1.  Camillo's 2.  Fig At Museo 3.  Saravana Bhavan 4.  AMA Cafe 5.  Andhra Bhavan 6.  Cafe Lota 7.  Jain Chawal Wale 8.  Di Ghent Cafe 9.  For Earth's Sake 10.  Cafe Tesu 11.  Juggernaut 12.  Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba 13.  Getafix 14.  Amour Bistro 15.  Sita Ram Diwan Chand 16.  Moolchand Paratha 17.  Eleved 18.  Caara At Malcha Marg 19.  Blanca 20.  Roastery 21.  Daisy Mae Garden Cafe 22.  Cactus Lily 23.  Milkind Cafe Camillo's Camillo's - The Manor Hotel, New Friends Colony, New Delhi See On Map Camillo's is one of our favourite pizza places in the capital, and now, luckily for us, they've launched a breakfast menu (served from 8 AM to 11 AM) that focuses on wholesome, uncomplicated breakfast delights. Our favourite from the (short and sweet) menu is their Creamy Chicken Sandwich, which checks all of the boxes for the ultimate comfort sandwich —with soft milk bread toasted to perfection, and a delectable chicken stuffing made with thousand island, dehydrated pineapple, and peppers.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 3,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.5/5  Fig At Museo Fig At Museo, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map Even on the hottest of days, you can rely on this cafe for a cool outdoor breakfast experience. Their breakfast menu includes a variety of eggs, open toast, pancakes and smoothie bowls. The outdoor area has many trees which help shade the area very well and there's a cool water mist in the summertime too. They also have an indoor seating area, if that's what you prefer. The cafe is placed inside Camera Museum which opens at 11 am, so after breakfast, you can visit the museum and learn about the history of photography!  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,400 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.5/5  Saravana Bhavan Saravana Bhavan, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map Saravana Bhavan is our all-time favourite when it comes to South Indian grub and for good reason—their food is absolutely delish. They’ve got dosa, idli, vada pav, uttapam, and all the southy food that makes breakfast a delight.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  AMA Cafe AMA Cafe, Majnu Ka Tila, New Delhi See On Map This Majnu Ka Tila joint offers a brekkie menu full of power-packed dishes. You can choose between a Himalayan Breakfast, an English one, or an American version. They’ve also got pancakes, cereal, eggs, and salads.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Andhra Bhavan Andhra Bhavan, New Delhi See On Map If you’re the kind of person who gets more confused the more options they see on the menu, you’re gonna love what these guys have in store for you. Andhra Bhavan’s breakfast section has an idli, a vada, and a dosa of your choice paired with tea or coffee. Go, say “breakfast,” done.  Opening Time: 11:30 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Cafe Lota Cafe Lota, Pragati Maidan, New Delhi See On Map If you haven’t been living under a rock, you probably know how amazing the food at Cafe Lota is (it’s a fan favourite for a reason). For brekkie options, you’ve got ragi vada pav, idli, and different paratha variants. If that’s not your jam (breakfast pun?), they’ve also got pancakes, sandwiches, egg bhurji and a distinctive quinoa upma we can’t wait to try.  Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,200 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.7/5  Jain Chawal Wale Jain Chawal Wale, Connaught Place, New Delhi See On Map You’ll almost always find a big crowd in front of this place partly because it’s in CP and partly because the vegetarian food here is some of the best you’ll find around town. Their breakfast options include chhole bhature, parathas, bread and paneer pakoras, and their special lassi and chaach.  Opening Time: 7 AM  Price For Two: INR 450 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Di Ghent Cafe Di Ghent Cafe, DLF Phase - 4, Gurgaon See On Map With a menu full of delicious food, this place is doing the first meal of the day all kinds of justice. They’ve got pancakes, crepes, bagels, toast, eggs, sandwiches, and a lot more. If that massive menu doesn’t spell breakfast, we don’t know what does.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  For Earth's Sake For Earth's Sake, DLF Phase - 5, Gurgaon See On Map This zero-waste cafe and store with two outlets in Gurgaon - Galleria and Southpoint Mall. While they don’t have a particular breakfast menu, they have breakfast foods such as sandwiches, bagels, open toast and vegetarian omelettes (made from besan and no, they don’t taste like cheelas).   Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 900 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/5  Cafe Tesu Cafe Tesu, Adchini, New Delhi See On Map This Adchini cafe has had our hearts for quite a while now. Their amazing tea blends and coffee concoctions are the perfect kickstarter to the morning, while the fruit bowls, waffles, eggs (so many variants), and Indian breakfast options will keep you going through the day (well, at least till lunch).  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,100 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.3/5  Juggernaut Juggernaut, Kailash Colony, New Delhi See On Map With good ol’ dosa, idli, vada pav, and uttapam, the cute, little cafe in Kailash Colony is doing brekkie right. You’ll also find muesli, sprouts, yogurt, sandwiches and more if you’re looking for a healthy alternative. How about a fresh fruit platter to finish it up?  Opening Time: 6 AM  Price For Two: INR 700 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba Amrik Sukhdev Dhaba, Sonipat See On Map Amrik Sukhdev is almost a landmark that has had a steady stream of patrons visiting it for years now. This dhaba offers both indoor and outdoor seating and the service is super quick. Try their famous paranthas and don't forget to end your meal with chai.  Open: 24 Hours   Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/5  Getafix Getafix Cafe, Greater Kailash - 1, New Delhi See On Map Getafix is a quaint café known for using fresh ingredients to make healthy, nutritious, and yummy food. Their smoothies and sandwiches, in particular, are amazing. You'll definitely find a range of continental breakfast options here.  Opening Time: 10 AM  Price For Two: INR 1,900 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.4/5  Amour Bistro Amour Bistro, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Amour Bistro has comfortable seating, beautiful decor, and great food. It has an eclectic breakfast menu offering sandwiches, waffles, pancakes, quiches and more - available from 8 am to 11:30 am.  Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 2,000 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4.2/5  Sita Ram Diwan Chand Sita Ram Diwan Chand, Paharganj, New Delhi See On Map Chhole Bhature hold a special place in the hearts of Delhiites and apparently people can have it for all meals. Sita Ram Diwan Chand is still arguably one of the best places for the same. Apart from that they also have Paneer Bhatura, Meethi Lassi, Chana Kulcha and Kulfi.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 300 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.6/5  Moolchand Paratha Moolchand Parantha, Lajpat Nagar - 4, New Delhi See On Map Parathas are a staple of an authentic Delhi breakfast. Moolchand Paratha serves a variety of paranthas, from the classic egg and paneer parantha to chilli garlic and egg keema parantha.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 4/6  Eleved Eleved, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Eleved is a totally different experience. They are the world's first elevated lifestyle brand inspired by Vedic wisdom and offer a unique and healthy breakfast menu that is Ayurveda-centric. The ambience is also super calming and soothing, with rattan and wooden textures enveloping you in a warm embrace. Their USP is the use of local and regional produce, giving them an international flair and profile. They also have a concept store and a yoga meditation centre called Life Yoga. The concept store offers clean and organic lifestyle products. From Andhra Green Gram Pesarattu Dosa to flavourful hummus bowls, this place is a must-visit for anyone looking for healthy-tasty and Ayurvedic meals. We recommend you start the perfect day by attending a yoga session and then indulging in a healthy breakfast here.  Opening Time: 9 AM  Price For Two: INR 500 (approx.)  Zomato Ratings: 3.9/5  Caara At Malcha Marg Caara At Ogaan, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi See On Map Caara has made a niche in Delhi, especially in the breakfast scene and for good reason. All of their menu items are as healthy as they are delicious, prepared using homegrown ingredients and supreme culinary techniques. Their Corn and kale Fritters with Poached Eggs, French Brie and tomato Tart, and CAARA Farmlove Salad are must-tries. You can also try their new location in Khan Market, etched with the Pure Home & Living store.   Opening Time: 8 AM  Price For Two: INR 2,700 (approx.) The real star is their menu, which has a long list of incredible food options like Hash Brown Benedict, Blanca Grilled Salmon, Hot Honey Chicken Waffle, Lotus Biscoff latte, and Macha Fomo.  - Sure! Here are 20 unique conversation dialogues where I play the role of a mentor discussing nightclubs in Delhi, wrapped up with thoughtful questions related to breakfast spots. 

---

1. **User:** I'm looking for the best nightclubs in Delhi to party this weekend. Any recommendations?  
   **Bot:** Absolutely! You should check out places like Kitty Su or Social. They offer fantastic vibes and great music. Have you considered what kind of atmosphere you’re hoping for? 

2. **User:** What about clubs for dancing?  
   **Bot:** For dancing, I’d suggest Cafe Delhi Heights and Raasta. They have a lively crowd and amazing playlists! What type of music gets you moving?

3. **User:** I want somewhere to drink as well.  
   **Bot:** In that case, try out The Hype or The Vault. They have excellent drink selections and vibrant scenes. What’s your favorite drink to kick off a night out?

4. **User:** Any clubs with a rooftop view?  
   **Bot:** Yes! Try out Aer or The Sky High. Their views are breathtaking! Do you enjoy the outdoors, especially while partying?

5. **User:** I want a club with good food too.  
   **Bot:** Then I’d recommend Farzi Cafe or Raasta. Both have delicious menus alongside great music. What kind of food do you like to munch on while partying?

6. **User:** How about a place that’s more relaxed?  
   **Bot:** You might enjoy The Beer Cafe or PCO. They have a laid-back vibe where you can unwind. What do you find most relaxing after a long week?

7. **User:** What’s the crowd like at these places?  
   **Bot:** The crowd varies; places like Kitty Su attract a younger audience, while others like The Hype are a mix. Do you prefer a more lively crowd or a chill atmosphere?

8. **User:** What are the best nights to go out?  
   **Bot:** Fridays and Saturdays are usually the busiest and most happening nights. Do you usually plan your outings in advance or go with the flow?

9. **User:** Are there any themed nights at these clubs?  
   **Bot:** Yes, many clubs have themed nights like Bollywood nights or Retro nights! Which theme do you find most exciting?

10. **User:** I heard about a club with live music.  
    **Bot:** Yes! Check out The Piano Man Jazz Club; it’s perfect for live music lovers. Do you enjoy discovering new artists while out?

11. **User:** What about entry fees?  
    **Bot:** Most clubs have an entry fee ranging from INR 500 to 2000, depending on the night. Do you think the experience is worth the investment?

12. **User:** What time do they usually close?  
    **Bot:** Most clubs close around 1 to 2 AM, but some stay open later on weekends. What’s your ideal time to call it a night?

13. **User:** Are there any clubs with outdoor seating?  
    **Bot:** Yes! Places like Auro and The Beer Cafe have lovely outdoor seating. Do you find outdoor spaces more enjoyable for socializing?

14. **User:** I want a place with good cocktails.  
    **Bot:** Try out The Junkyard Cafe or Dhan Mill Cafe; they have innovative cocktails. What’s your go-to cocktail when you’re out?

15. **User:** What’s the vibe like at these clubs?  
    **Bot:** It really depends on the night! Some are electric and energetic, while others can be more chill. What kind of vibe helps you enjoy your night out?

16. **User:** How to get on the guest list?  
    **Bot:** You can usually contact the club directly or use social media to get on the guest list. Have you ever been on a guest list before?

17. **User:** Can you suggest a club for a special birthday celebration?  
    **Bot:** For birthdays, places like The Hype or Social can be great! They often have birthday packages. What makes a birthday celebration special for you?

18. **User:** I’m also looking for a place to take friends from out of town.  
    **Bot:** Consider places like The Imperial or The Claridges for a more upscale experience. What do you want your friends to experience while they’re here?

19. **User:** Any clubs that are LGBTQ+ friendly?  
    **Bot:** Yes! Places like 1 Lounge and Cafe Out of the Box are known for being inclusive and welcoming. How important is inclusivity to you when choosing a place to go?

20. **User:** Thanks for all the suggestions! Any final tips?  
    **Bot:** Just remember to have fun and stay safe! Also, maybe grab a hearty breakfast the next day at one of those lovely cafes I mentioned earlier. What’s your favorite breakfast dish to start the day right?

---

I hope these dialogues help you explore the vibrant nightlife of Delhi while keeping in mind the importance of a good breakfast! Let me know if you want to dive deeper into any topic! +
